¡ACTIVIDADES DE COMITÉ!

Este sábado nuestro comité organizó bienvenidas y despedidas masivas de nuestros estudiantes Linarenses. 

Junto a las familias de cada estudiante y nuestro comité dimos la bienvenida a Simone, y Luna, ambos de Italia 🇮🇹, quienes pasarán un semestre en Linares y Constitución (aún estamos a la espera de 2 estudiantes más). Por otro lado también le dimos la bienvenida a  Simón, Magda y Antonia, estudiantes linarenses quienes volvieron de sus intercambios en Brasil 🇧🇷, Austria 🇦🇹 e Italia 🇮🇹. Todos nos contaron de sus intercambios y experiencias a través de una entretenida presentación con fotos. 
Y finalmente despedimos a Josefa, Mateo y Emilia, quienes en un par de semanas  comenzarán están aventura en Países Bajos 🇳🇱, Bélgica Flamenca 🇧🇪 y Francia 🇫🇷 

Aprovechamos la instancia de tener a padres y estudiantes para orientarlos en sus respectivos procesos.

¡Le deseamos los mejor a cada unos de ellos! 🌎✈️

#afschile #afslinares #exchangestudent

8月10日Day16(19)
朝ゆっくり起きたら、ホストファミリーがドーナツ🍩を買ってきてくれていました！
外側の砂糖がカリカリ✨で、中はフワッフワ…最高すぎました🤤

その後はホストファミリーや犬たち🐶とソファーでまったりおしゃべり。
お昼ごはんはポテト🍟とお惣菜みたいなテキサスバーベキュー🍖、そしてベーコン🥓！
今日は失敗せず、ちゃんと時間通りに作れました🙌

午後はホストパパと犬たちと一緒にアメリカンフットボール🏈のドラマ？（Netflix）を鑑賞。
見ている最中、いろんなワンちゃんが私の上に乗ってきて、もう可愛すぎて動けませんでした🥰🐕🐕🐕🐕🐕🐕🐕

それにしてもアメリカのカレッジフットボール…規模・人気・選手の仕上がり方、全部えげつない！
最初、プロの試合かと思ってました🤯
そしてら大学生同士の試合でびっくり。
今度行ける試合がますます楽しみになりました✨

夜はホストママ直伝のガーリック入りマッシュポテト🥔と、大量のブロッコリー🥦！
久々の野菜が体に染みました…
ブロッコリーの美味しさに改めて気づかされた一日でした🥦🥦🥦🥦🥦🥦🥦🥦🥦🥦🥦🥦

Pendaftaran Jalur Fully Funded Youth Future Leader

Halo Generasi Emas!!

Perkenalkan saya (Siti Rosliana), (Man 1 Pandeglang). Dengan semangat untuk terus belajar dan berkembang, saya siap mengikuti program International Future Leader #5 yang akan dilaksanakan pada 21-25 November 2025 di Malaysia & Singapura

(Tuliskan kata motivasi terbaik menurutmu)

IFL adalah forum Internasional yang bertujuan untuk mencetak "Generasi Indonesia Emas 2045" dengan fokus pada peningkatan kualitas generasi muda.

Dalam kegiatan ini, sobat YFL akan terlibat aktif dalam program:
✅International Conference
✅International Business & Global Networking
✅University Visit & Discussion
✅IFL Project & Group Discussion
✅Malaysia Social & Culture Explore
✅Awarding For The Best Delegates & Grup

➡️Timeline Kegiatan:
🗓️Pendaftaran: 1 Agustus 10 September 2025
✈️Keberangkatan Malaysia, Singapore: 21-25 November 2025

➡️Registrasi: https://bit.ly/OPREGPENDAFTARANYFLBATCH5

(Mention Instagram @youth.future.leader dan mention 5 teman terbaik mu)

➡️Informasi & Pendaftaran:

Official Instagram: @youth.future.leader
Website: https://linktr.ee/MSGFOUNDATION

The Adelaide Institute of Higher Education (AIHE) is a dynamic and innovative higher education provider located in the heart of Adelaide, South Australia. The launch of new Schengen visa application centers in Abuja and Lagos, Nigeria, as part of Germany’s seven-year partnership with VFS Global, eliminates long waiting times for visa appointments. AuPairChronicles.SE // Chapter 6

Autumn in Göteborg started strong: a day trip to ghost-town-level-empty Marstrand 🏝️

Then came the holy trinity on Kanelbullens dag:
• Zimtschnecken baking in group therapy mode
• homesick “Spätzle mit Soß’ power cooking
• and an ever-growing friend group 🍂🧡

Other highlights included:
• brunch at Hanna’s with visitors from Paris (ft. wild Paris Au Pair stories) 🥞☕️
• KulturNatta – orchestral vibes + mild panic while trying to find the church for Hanna’s first choir performance (Google Maps did not help) ⛪🎶
• Trick or Treat chaos with the kids 🍬
• and a Halloween party that felt like a social simulation gone wrong — ended with a drunk guy on the bus, an emergency exit, and running into random Germans mid-flee 🚌💨

Dear Uniflucht Family 🙂 

If you’re a history buff interested in either of the World Wars, Belgium has a million sites to keep you busy during your visit. And if you want to learn about government or politics of the EU, it’s the home to the European Union itself.
But what most travelers come for is the beer, chocolate, and fries.
Bruges, filled historical and medieval buildings, canals, and cobblestone streets, is one of the most popular medieval cities in Europe, especially after the movie In Bruges shed light on it. Bus loads of people come here for quick trips to take photos of the canals and buildings.

😎
Brussels & Bruges Trip (Weekend Activity)

😍⌛23 September 2023

WELCOME TO OPEN MIC 101! 

***

Consider this post your one stop shop for any Grizzly related questions! This post includes our rules, our layout, our location, our start time, and a handy guide on what to bring with you! Plus, a sneaky meet the hosts fitting in right at the end. 

***

Our rules are simple! No hate speech, trigger warn your poetry, keep your slot to four minutes or less, support others, listen respectfully, and clap loudly at the end of poems!
*
Our layout is simple! We begin at eight pm, and we randomly select five open mic-ers names from our magical hat. After they have performed, we have a short break, and we rinse and repeat. After our final five slots, our fantastic headliner - whoever they may be - takes the stage to close the night!
*
What to bring is simple! Government issued photo-ID is a requirement - we're held in Circo, which is a bar in Selly Oak, so you need to be eighteen to enter. If you're a student, bring your student-ID along too. You'll also need £3-£5 in cash, £3 for students, £5 for non students. This is annoying, we know, but there is a cashpoint really nearby. 

***

We hope this handy guide helps make your Grizzly experience Pear-fect in every way! Izzie and Q look forward to meeting you at the next open mic!

🐻🍐

***

🤝 Hast Du schon einmal etwas von einer Tandempartnerschaft gehört?
Ich könnte auch Sparringpartnerschaft sagen, nur bringt es die Bezeichnung Tandempartnerschaft noch besser auf den Punkt.

Sprich - eine Partnerin (in meinem Falle),
📌 die Dir mit Rat und Tat zur Seite steht, Dich ein Stück Deines Weges begleitet
📌 die auch mal Tacheles redet und objektiv bewertet
📌 die Dich bei konkreten Entscheidungen und/oder strategischer (Neu-)Ausrichtungen unterstützt
📌 die mit Dir Deine Ideen, Pläne und Zielsetzungen vorab auf die Probe stellt und durchspielt
📌 die Dich bei Veränderungsprozessen und Weiterentwicklungen Deines Unternehmens begleitet
📌 die mitdenkt, kritisch hinterfragt und ihre Erfahrung sowie Expertise einbringt
📌 die Dir das gute Gefühl der Sicherheit schenkt

💯 Eine vertrauensvolle, verlässliche Partnerschaft auf Augenhöhe, mit gegenseitiger Achtung und Wertschätzung - die Dich bei Deiner strategischen Unternehmensentwicklung unterstützt und vor allem mitträgt!

🔴 Ein starkes Team - Du als Experte*in in Deinem Geschäftsbereich und Deine Tandempartnerin in ihrem!

💡 Ich begleite seit Jahren Unternehmer*innen im Rahmen dieser Programme und muss sagen, dass sich diese Partnerschaften einfach mit großem Mehrwert auszahlen und vor allem gut anfühlen!

#katrinfeldmann #einfachanders #wirtschaftsberatung #marketingberatung #beratung #tandempartner #partnerschaft #ziel #augenhöhe #erfolg #zukunft #zusammenarbeit #unternehmensentwicklung #veränderung #chance

🇩🇪 Finde einen deutschen Freund, mit dem du gemeinsame Interessen hast, statt jemanden, der deine Muttersprache lernt, weil…🇬🇧 Find a German friend you have things in common with instead of one learning your native language because…

🇩🇪 gemeinsam: common🇩🇪 die Muttersprache: native language(feminine cause it ends with -e)

🇩🇪 weil du dann gezwungen wirst, Deutsch zu sprechen und zuzuhören, da dein deutscher Freund deine Sprache nicht verstehen wird.🇬🇧 because you’ll then be forced to speak and listen to German since your German friend won’t understand your language.
🇩🇪 zwingen: to force🇩🇪 zuhören: listen

🇩🇪 Da ihr gemeinsame Interessen habt, werdet ihr ganz natürlich mehr Zeit miteinander verbringen, während ihr auf Deutsch miteinander sprecht!🇬🇧 Since you have things in common, you’ll naturally be spending more time together while talking in German!
🇩🇪 miteinander: together🇩🇪 verbringen: to spend

#tandem #tandempartner #deutschlernen #deutschüben #sprechenlernen #sprechensiedeutsch #sprechen

🤫 Scared of Speaking a New Language? You're Not Alone! Here's How to Break Through and Start Talking! 💬

Heart racing, words stuck in your throat? The fear of speaking a new language is incredibly common! But guess what? That's perfectly okay and totally human. The first step is to remember it's all about connection, not perfection.

Here are a few tried-and-tested tips to help you build your courage:
1️⃣ Start Small & In a Safe Space: Practice talking to yourself, your pet (they're great listeners!), or a trusted friend. A session with a patient tutor or a language exchange partner who understands can also work wonders. Low pressure is key! 
2️⃣ Embrace Mistakes as Learning Tools: It might sound cliché, but it's true! Every mistake is proof that you're trying and an opportunity to learn and improve. No one expects you to be flawless from day one. 
3️⃣ Focus on Communication, Not Perfection: Your main goal is to get your message across and connect with others, not to sound like a native speaker instantly (that comes with time 😉). People genuinely appreciate the effort! 
4️⃣ A Little Preparation Goes a Long Way: Having a few go-to phrases or topics ready for common situations (ordering coffee, asking for directions) can significantly boost your confidence. 
5️⃣ Find Your Language Tribe: Connect with language buddies, join a conversation group, or find a tandem partner. Practicing regularly in a supportive, non-judgmental environment can make all the difference.

Remember: Every attempt you make, every word you speak, is a victory over your own hesitation. Be proud of your progress! You've got this! 💪

✨ Which of these tips will you try first? Or do you have a personal strategy that helped you overcome your fear of speaking? Share your wisdom in the comments below! 👇

#languagelearning #learnenglish #speakenglish #foreignlanguage #speakinganxiety #languagebarrier #fearofspeaking #communicationskills #languagepractice #speakconfidently #boostconfidence #learningtips #englishlearner #esl #languagebuddy #tandempartner #motivation #inspiration #languagegoals #yougotthis #nevergiveup #learningenglish #practicemakesprogress

🤫 Angst vorm Sprechen? Du bist nicht allein! So überwindest du die Hürde und kommst ins Reden! 💬

Das Herz pocht, die Worte wollen einfach nicht raus? Die Angst, in einer neuen Sprache Fehler zu machen oder nicht verstanden zu werden, kennen unglaublich viele Sprachlerner. Aber das Wichtigste zuerst: Das ist völlig normal und du bist damit definitiv nicht allein! Der Schlüssel liegt darin, den Fokus von Perfektion auf Kommunikation zu lenken.

Hier sind ein paar bewährte Tipps, die dir helfen können, deine Sprechängste Schritt für Schritt abzubauen:

1️⃣ Starte im Kleinen und Sicheren: Übe mit dir selbst vor dem Spiegel, sprich mit deinem Haustier (ja, wirklich!), einem guten Freund oder einem geduldigen Sprachlehrer. Eine Umgebung ohne Druck ist Gold wert. 
2️⃣ Fehler sind deine Lern-Booster: Sieh Fehler nicht als Niederlage, sondern als wichtige Wegweiser. Jeder Fehler zeigt dir, wo du dich noch verbessern kannst und dass du mutig genug bist, es zu versuchen! 
3️⃣ Kommunikation schlägt Perfektion: Dein Ziel ist es, dich verständlich zu machen und eine Verbindung aufzubauen – nicht, von Anfang an wie ein Muttersprachler zu klingen. Die meisten Menschen wissen deine Bemühungen sehr zu schätzen! 
4️⃣ Bereite dich ein wenig vor: Ein paar Sätze oder Vokabeln für typische Alltagssituationen (Bestellung im Café, nach dem Weg fragen) parat zu haben, kann Wunder für dein Selbstvertrauen wirken. 
5️⃣ Finde Sprach-Buddies oder Tandempartner: Regelmäßiger Austausch mit anderen Lernenden oder Muttersprachlern in entspannter Atmosphäre nimmt die Angst und macht oft sogar richtig Spaß.
Denk dran: Jeder einzelne Satz, den du sprichst, ist ein riesiger Sieg über die Unsicherheit. Sei stolz auf jeden Versuch! 💪
✨ Welchen dieser Tipps möchtest du als Nächstes ausprobieren? Oder hast du einen eigenen Geheimtipp gegen Sprechangst? Teile ihn mit uns in den Kommentaren! 👇

caption:
🧠📚 Sprachen lernen – aber richtig!
Du büffelst Vokabeln, hörst Podcasts und klickst fleißig durch Sprachlern-Apps? Das ist ein guter Start – aber es fehlt das Wichtigste: das Sprechen! 💬

Viele unterschätzen, wie mächtig echte Gespräche sind:
Du lernst schneller, merkst dir mehr und bekommst echtes Sprachgefühl. 💡

👉 Egal ob Tandempartner, Sprachgruppe oder einfach laut mit dir selbst reden – trau dich zu sprechen!
Fehler sind kein Rückschritt, sondern der Weg zum Ziel. 🚀

📌 Swipe durch den Post und finde heraus, warum Reden der wahre Gamechanger beim Sprachenlernen ist.

🔴 Zusammenbringen, was zusammengehört! [nach Willy Brandt]

Wie? 
Meine Empfehlung: 
🤝 Sparringpartnerschaft!

In den letzten Jahren stelle ich bei meinen Klienten immer häufiger fest, dass der Wunsch nach einer solchen Partnerschaft größer wird und genau das i-Tüpfelchen unserer Zusammenarbeit ist.

Worum geht’s?
🔐 Eine vertrauensvolle, verlässliche Gemeinschaft auf Augenhöhe, die Dich bei Deiner Entwicklung unterstützt und trägt!
🎯 Das Ziel immer im Blickwinkel und der Weg ganz individuell - so wie DU!

Eine Partnerin (in meinem Falle), die

📌 Dir zur Seite steht, Dich ein Stück Deines Weges begleitet
📌 auch mal Tacheles redet und objektiv bewertet
📌 Dich bei konkreten Entscheidungen, Veränderungen und/oder bei strategischen (Neu-)Ausrichtungen unterstützt
📌 mit Dir Deine Ideen, Pläne und Zielsetzungen vorab auf die Probe stellt und durchspielt
📌 Dich bei Veränderungsprozessen und Weiterentwicklungen Deines Unternehmens begleitet
📌 mitdenkt, hinterfragt und ihre Erfahrung sowie Expertise einbringt

💯 Egal, wo Du gerade stehst, wie erfolgreich (oder auch nicht) und wie selbstreflektiert Du bist, ich kann nur voller Überzeugung sagen, dass mich Sparringpartner*innen stets sehr viel weiter gebracht, meine Weiterentwicklung angekurbelt und mir an der ein oder anderen Stelle Bruchlandungen erspart haben - und genau das spiegeln mir auch meine Kund*innen wider.

Ich nenne es übrigens auch gern Tandempartnerschaft.

Erfolgsversprechend, oder?

Lass uns darüber fachsimpeln - ich freue mich auf Dich!

❓ Hast Du schon einmal Erfahrung gemacht mit einer Sparringpartnerschaft?

#katrinfeldmann #einfachanders #beratung #sparringspartnerschaft #Tandempartner #wirtschaftsberatung #marketingberatung #zukunft #augenhöhe #erfahrung #unternehmensberatung #strategie #unternehmensentwicklung

Tu souhaites t’inscrire aux programmes en alternance en Business Development de la CFACI, mais tu n’es pas sûr de ton niveau d’allemand ?

Rejoins le tandem franco-allemand proposé par Lingualog pour améliorer ton allemand en expression et compréhension orale et gagner en fluidité à l'oral, bénéficier d'une immersion linguistique et renforcer ta confiance !

✅Rendez-vous sur Zoom le jeudi tous les 15 jours 
 ✅1h15 de conversation entre français et allemands 
✅Une thématique différente à chaque séance
✅Échanges avec 2 partenaires dans des groupes de 3/4 personnes, avec 30 min en allemand et 30 min en français
✅Ambiance bienveillante et chaleureuse
✅Assistance en direct dans les groupes pour assurer le bon déroulement
✅Tarifs : 1ère séance découverte OFFERTE puis : 9 euros pour 1h15 (pack semestriel)

Inscris-toi sur le site Lingualog et t’informer sur les prochaines dates !
👉https://www.coursfrancoallemand.com/accueil/ 
---
Du möchtest Dich für die dualen Programme der AHK Frankreich einschreiben, bist Dir aber unsicher, ob Dein Deutschniveau ausreicht?

Melde Dich jetzt für das deutsch-französischen Tandem von Lingualog an, um Dein Deutsch in Ausdruck und Hörverstehen zu verbessern, flüssiger zu sprechen, von einer intensiven Sprachpraxis zu profitieren und Dein Selbstvertrauen zu stärken!

✅ Treffpunkt auf Zoom, jeden zeiten Donnerstag
✅ 1h15 Konversation zwischen Franzosen und Deutschen
✅ Verschiedene Themen in jeder Sitzung
✅ Austausch mit 2 Partnern in Gruppen von 3-4 Personen, 30 Min. auf Deutsch und 30 Min. auf Französisch
✅ Wohlwollende und herzliche Atmosphäre
✅ Live-Unterstützung in den Gruppen für einen reibungslosen Ablauf
✅ Kosten: 1. Schnupperstunde KOSTENLOS, danach: 9 Euro für 1h15 (Halbjahrespaket)

Melde dich auf der Lingualog-Website an und informiere dich über die nächsten Termine!👉https://www.coursfrancoallemand.com/accueil/

In a major step toward fulfilling its student welfare manifesto, the Indian National Students’ Organization (INSO) has donated gym equipment to three girls’ hostels (GH 04, 07, 10) and three boys’ hostels (BH 01, 02, 04) at Panjab University. The initiative, promised by Ex-National President Sh. Digvijay Chautala, aims to promote fitness, physical health, and mental well-being among students.

The effort was led by PUCSC Secretary Vineet Yadav, This year candidate Vishesh Dhaka, INSO President Jashan Saini, and Chairman Anirudh Malhan. INSO leaders stated that creating accessible wellness facilities is a key priority for the party.

The gym equipment was handed over in the presence of student leaders Jashan Saini, Anirudh Malhan, Aryan Saharan, Vishesh Dhaka, Gagandeep Lohan (Khanda Kheri), Keshav Raval, Krish Asija, Supreet Malik, Sahil Sheokand, Manmeet Siwach, Veeram Chauhan, Dhairya Gupta, Dinesh Srivastav, Kinshuk, Anuj Malik, Vansh, Anni Nain, Yash Raj, Ritik Yadav, Gumaan, Aadarsh and Armaan Chahal.
.

From learners to leaders, participants of the Community Learning Programme stepped into their own communities to pilot activities rooted in what they learned. From dye baths to weaving circles, each workshop was a space of knowledge-sharing, curiosity, and care. 

These moments reflect the ripple effect of community-led learning: local, hands-on, and deeply collaborative.

—————————————————
Community Cloth is a collaboration between @barbotbernardo / @osaberfazer (PT), @alternativebrainsrule (CY), @smuss.studio (NO).

🎯 ERASMUS+ program 👉 výměna zkušeností v mezinárodním prostředí 👉 moderní přístupy ve výuce 👉 seberozvoj 👍

📌 O letních prázdninách 2025 se vzdělávacích jazykových kurzů zúčastnili čtyři kolegové, kteří navštívili zahraniční instituce na Kypru a Maltě. Příspěvky kolegů si budete moci přečíst v dalších příspěvcích, které zde budou postupně zveřejněny. 😉

📌 Programem ERASMUS + podporujme celoživotní vzdělávání i otevřenost vůči mezinárodní spolupráci. Investici do rozvoje pedagogů považujeme za investici do budoucnosti celé školy 🍀 do kvality výuky a budoucnosti našich žáků. 🍀

💙 Pro následující školní rok 2025/2026 máme výbornou zprávu. 👍

📌 Také v následujícím školním roce budeme moci podporovat zahraniční stáže žáků SŠ, vzdělávací kurzy a sdílení dobrých zkušeností pedagogů školy, dlouhodobé odborné stáže/praxe a realizaci letní školy pro studenty VOŠ. 

📌 💙🍀 Velké poděkování patří koordinátoru programu ERASMUS+, panu Mgr. Pavlu Kluhovi, který zajistil pro školu novou Smlouvu o realizaci aktivit a získal tak finanční prostředky na pokrytí výloh výše uvedených akcí. Děkujeme. 🍀💙👏

Living in Australia has its pros and cons, which can vary based on individual preferences and circumstances. 

Let’s break it down:

🔶 Pros:
	•	High liveability: Melbourne & Sydney rank top 10 globally.
	•	Strong economy, low unemployment, quality healthcare.
	•	Multicultural, safe, and naturally beautiful.
	•	Good universities & clear citizenship pathway.

🔶 Cons:
	•	High cost of living & housing shortage.
	•	Expensive groceries and services.
	•	Limited public transport outside cities.
	•	Long healthcare wait times.
	•	Geographic isolation & natural hazards.

Overall, great quality of life, but high costs and distance from the rest of the world are the main trade-offs.

Have a lovely week, my followers! 🎉💜

MEET YOUR MENTOR: JACK R. —
Cambridge, History and Politics 🏛️

After a long process of balancing 5 Courses at A level and an arduous double-honours application process involving extensive reading, interview and application test practice, Jack has now just finished his First Year of Studying History & Politics at Peterhouse College, Cambridge. Although certainly not easy, Jack understands the process of applying to the UK's top universities to be a deeply rewarding journey which engages oneself more deeply in their academic interests than likely ever before and sharpens their academic skills significantly in preparation for University.

Via Oxbridged, Jack aims to guide prospective students undergoing that very same application process, providing advice, academic support and knowledge gained over the first year of rigorous study at Cambridge.

Australians could be at risk of missing out on valuable insurance payouts while travelling overseas, a legal expert warns.
A spate of Australians have been involved in major accidents or incidents overseas recently, including narrowly escaping a sinking boat in Bali that killed three people.

Whilst most Australians do purchase travel insurance before venturing overseas, they have been urged to check the fine print of their plan.

🌍 STUDYING ABROAD?
Not sure where to start? You don’t have to figure it out alone.

We are excited to share the latest findings from our Erasmus+ project, "Insects Innovation in Gastronomy." 

The research explores the potential of insects as a sustainable protein source and focuses on attitudes toward insect consumption across multiple European countries, including Spain, Italy, Turkey, Cyprus, Greece, and Romania. 

Key Highlights:
🔸 Consumer Insights: We surveyed chefs, professionals in hospitality (HoReCa), and consumers to understand readiness for insect consumption.
🔸 Food neophobia: Addressing challenges like food neophobia and cultural barriers to accepting insects as food.
🔸 Nutritional Benefits: Examining the awareness of insects' nutritional value and environmental impact.

Desk Research Insights:
▶️ Historical Context: Exploring cultural traditions surrounding insect consumption across Europe.
▶️ Technological Innovations: Reviewing insect farming and processing advancements.
▶️ Regulatory Landscape: Analyzing EU policies on food safety, labeling, and marketing of insect-based food.

The findings will guide strategies to introduce insects into European markets, promoting them as a sustainable and nutritious protein alternative. Explore the full report on our website. 
https://gastroinnovation.eu/results/ 

#InsectsInnovation #SustainableFood #Gastronomy #ErasmusPlus #Entomophagy #SustainableProtein #FoodInnovation

Hogyan teremthetünk valódi biztonságot a fiatalokkal végzett munkánkban? 
Milyen helyzetekre érdemes előre felkészülni, és hogyan segíthet ebben egy átgondolt gyermekvédelmi protokoll – ami nemcsak egy papír, hanem a mindennapokban is él?

Szeptember 18-i szakmai napunkon együtt gondolkodunk ezekről a kérdésekről. Valós eseteket, hazai és nemzetközi példákat hozunk, és az ifjúsági munka mindennapi tapasztalataira építünk. 

Szó lesz többek között:
🔍 nehéz helyzetek kezeléséről,
📕 gyermekvédelmi irányelvekről,
⚠️ a grooming megelőzésről és felismerésről,
🛡️ bevált safeguarding gyakorlatokról.

Tarts velünk! A részvétel ingyenes, de a helyek száma korlátozott, ezért érdemes időben jelentkezni. 👉 Részletek a BIÓban!

At the end of June, we hosted a training course called Nature Logbook, spending 7 days camping with youth workers from across Europe. Together, we reconnected with nature, shared methods, exchanged good practices, and created new activities designed to help young people build a genuine connection with the natural world.

Since then, we’ve been working on the Nature Logbook toolkit, a collection of tools, activities, and ideas to inspire ecological education based on observation, creativity, and reflection. Soon, we’ll be ready to share it with youth workers everywhere.

Day 6 was all about sounds music, nature, our voices, the beats and rhythms our bodies can make, and the noises of each other and the world around us 🎶.

It marked the close of Act 2 of our time here in Ommen, a chapter of creating, exploring different artforms, mediums, and activating. 

We started with a walk to the Sahara, letting the journey be part of the exploration. On the way, we played while listening, sharing and thinking about our connection to music and the art of sound.

When we got there, we walked, listened, and made noises to explore what is there for us with both the world around us and each other. Soon our jam session started, mixing natural sounds, instruments, voices and our own rhythms.

Later, we got into recording and playing with radio theatre, telling our own stories of queer joy 📻.

To close the day, we sat together and shared gratitude for the journey so far, for the connections and community we’ve built, and for the queer art and queer spaces we’ve claimed. We leave this chapter feeling full of love, of creativity, of the belief that art and each other can carry us forward 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️.

Youth creativity from What If? goes on.

When the internet disappears, the story begins.
This time, our main character is Marinela, a 20-year-old girl from Kazakhstan living in Jamaica, who finds herself in the middle of a storm with no electricity, no WiFi, and no digital distractions.

What would you do?

Marinela cleaned, walked around her neighborhood, read a book, and ended up writing a poem… just maybe a little bit different than you would imagine. Her story became a comic during the What If? Youth Exchange, a reminder that sometimes, no WiFi means the best stories.

📌 Partners: @euroactive.rs

The new issue of We See magazine is out!

Cordinated by femLENS, it’s a bold, community-driven publication that amplifies the visual and narrative voices of women who’ve historically been excluded from mainstream media.

Τι είναι η Βιομηχανία 4.0; 

Η Βιομηχανία 4.0 – ή αλλιώς η τέταρτη βιομηχανική επανάσταση – αλλάζει ριζικά τον τρόπο που ζούμε, εργαζόμαστε και μαθαίνουμε. 💡 

Με την ταχεία πρόοδο της τεχνολογίας, οι επιχειρήσεις αναζητούν εργαζομένους με ψηφιακές δεξιότητες και ικανότητες προσαρμογής. Η εκπαίδευση δεν μπορεί να μείνει πίσω. Πρέπει να μετασχηματιστεί, προωθώντας διεπιστημονική σκέψη και συστημική προσέγγιση σε όλα τα εκπαιδευτικά περιβάλλοντα – ακόμα και στα μη τεχνικά σχολεία. 

🔄 Η εξειδίκευση παραχωρεί τη θέση της στην ευελιξία και την ολιστική κατανόηση. 
🎯 Νέες θέσεις εργασίας δημιουργούνται, νέες ανάγκες αναδύονται. 
📚 Το μέλλον της εκπαίδευσης είναι ήδη εδώ – και είναι ψηφιακό. 

➡️ Ως OECON GROUP, χαιρόμαστε που συμμετέχουμε στο ευρωπαϊκό έργο Digital Inclusion VET, με στόχο του τη βελτίωση της Επαγγελματικής Εκπαίδευσης και Κατάρτισης (ΕΕΚ), ώστε να στηριχθούν άνεργοι ενήλικες με ελλείψεις σε ψηφιακές δεξιότητες και να μπορέσουν να ενταχθούν στον κόσμο της Βιομηχανίας 4.0.

Our first Peace INfluencers training ‘Critical Eye Reading Media’ is a wrap - and it brought together voices, insights, and stories that will stay with us for a long time!
 
For 6 days, participants from 11 countries gathered in Pniewy to explore how we can stay critical, curious, and grounded while swimming through the overwhelming ocean of online content. 🌊💻

We questioned, analyzed, debated, and co-created. We dug into how digital media can be both a tool and a trap - and how young people can use their voices for peace, justice, and connection instead of division and noise. 💬

And the good news? This was just the beginning! ✨

In a few months, we’ll meet again for the second Peace INfluencers training "Crafting Influence Through Digital Narratives", this time focused on digital storytelling and creative influence. If this is your vibe, stay with us. You won’t want to miss what’s coming next. 😉

“Peace INfluencers: Empowering Youth Agency through Creating Digital Content for Peace” is a project run by Stowarzyszenie Jeden Świat - SCI Poland and funded by the European Union.

#PeaceIN #P_IN #PeaceINfluencers #VolunteeringForPeace #DigitalActivism #ErasmusPlus #PeaceCreators #YouthForPeace

Chaque semaine, le Club International de Paris organise des ateliers de conversation et d’échange linguistique franco-anglais. 
En fonction de la demande, ces ateliers peuvent aussi être franco-espagnol, franco-arabe ou franco-allemand.

Les ateliers se déroulent de la manière suivante : la première heure nous parlons en français et la deuxième heure en anglais, en espagnol, en arabe ou en allemand.

Ces ateliers se déroulent dans le magnifique cadre du salon de thé de la Mosquée de Paris, où vous pouvez déguster de délicieuses pâtisseries orientales et siroter le fameux thé à la menthe, tout en perfectionnant vos compétences linguistiques !
Pour participer aux prochains ateliers et découvrir le programme, visitez le site https://club-international.org
Photos : Rayan Barr
#conversation #echangelinguistique #conversationenfrançais #learnfrench #learnenglish #conversationexchange #culturalexchange

Обучение языкам становится гораздо интереснее и эффективнее, когда у вас есть возможность практиковаться с носителями языка. Вот несколько отличных платформ, где вы можете найти языковых партнеров:

1. **Tandem** 🌍
   - Приложение, которое соединяет людей, желающих обмениваться языковыми навыками.
   - Легко найти партнера для текстовых и видео-чатов.

2. **HelloTalk** 📱
   - Социальная сеть для изучающих языки.
   - Возможность исправления ошибок и живого общения с носителями языка.

3. **Speaky** 🗣️
   - Платформа, где можно найти партнеров по языковому обмену со всего мира.
   - Функции видео- и текстовых чатов.

4. **ConversationExchange** 🌐
   - Веб-сайт, где можно найти партнеров для общения онлайн или вживую.
   - Отлично подходит для тех, кто хочет встретиться лично для языковой практики.

#ЛингваСтар #ЯзыковыеПартнеры #ИзучениеЯзыков #Tandem #HelloTalk #Speaky #ConversationExchange #italki #ЯзыковойОбмен

caption:
El gringo quiere aprender a hacer arepas...

Me preguntó: Podrías enseñarme cómo preparar arepas venezolanas? 😯 Y yo en 1 2 x 3 le envié las 3 opciones de harina de maíz que debía buscar en los "Yunaitis"

¿Cómo no emocionarme cuando alguien ajeno a mis raíces, mostraba interés en un plato típico de mi país? 

Es un hecho, pocos extranjeros llegan a interesarse en nuestra cultura, mientras que otros, quedan enganchados a nuestra indiosincrasia.

¡Que alegría haber compartido un pedacito de nuestro "terruño" y de una de las cosas  que nos hace mundialmente conocidos como Venezolanos! 🇻🇪

¿Te ha pasado lo mismo?  O... ¿Sólo te preguntas quién es el gringo?
.
.
.
.
.
.
#languagepartner #conversationexchange #arepavenezolana #arepa
.
.
.
Cabe destacar que esta publicación no es publicidad. Tampoco pretende irrespetar el gentilicio mediante el uso de la palabra "gringo" y mucho menos abrir un debate de cual marca de harina de maíz es mejor. ✌🏿

☀️ Still thinking about summer in Bath? Us too.

Our Jane Austen in Bath course - offered during Summer School - blends literary analysis with exploring the city Austen once called home.

The good news? A version of the course also runs during the Spring and Autumn semesters. Simply titled Jane Austen, it offers a broader look at her major novels, narrative style, and enduring cultural legacy.

Both versions include unforgettable study trips — from Austen’s house in Chawton to the Assembly Rooms of Bath. It’s a rare chance to read, walk, and live in Austen’s world.

Swipe to see why it’s a student favourite! ➡️

Sarah Ater, a PhD student in Development Studies at the Technical University of Mombasa (TUM), recently returned from an enriching four-month semester abroad at the University of Szczecin in Poland. Sponsored through the Erasmus+ Student Exchange Programme under a full scholarship, Sarah joined the university’s Doctoral School from March to July 2025, where she undertook seven multidisciplinary units and earned straight As in all of them!

We’d also like to thank the amazing student buddies for their assistance during orientation week. We hope the students enjoy every moment of their experience in Indonesia 😉

Acicis semester programs are supported by the Australian Government’s @newcolomboplan.

Making lifelong friends and exploring new places is a major perk of studying abroad! Just ask @brettk1022 from @flaglercollege, who spent a spring semester in Granada, Spain. 🇪🇸

“I connected almost immediately with members of my group—we spent the semester exploring Granada and traveling around Europe on the weekends and on breaks. I also feel that I made positive connections with professors and certainly with my host family! I still talk to all of them!”

Comment "SPAIN" and we’ll DM you details on our study abroad and international internship program options there! 🌍

🍻 The Legendary RUIN BAR HOPPING is BACK!
Dear international students, Erasmus newcomers, and nightlife lovers —
It’s time to kick off the semester in true Budapest style! 🕺💃

On August 1st, join us for the one and only Ruin Bar Hopping by Erasmus Life Budapest — a night of pre-drinks, games, new friends, and unforgettable vibes 🎉

✨ What’s waiting for you?
✅ 7 drinks included (beer & shots)
✅ Visit 3 iconic bars + fast-lane VIP entry to Instant-Fogasház
✅ Fun drinking games (beer pong, flip cup, etc.)
✅ A full-on international party experience
✅ The easiest way to meet people if you’re new in town!

Whether you came alone or with friends — you’ll leave with memories, laughter, and probably a few new Instagram followers 🍹📸

📍 Meeting Point: Doboz – Klauzál utca 10.
🕗 Meeting Time: 20:15
(If you're late or lost, no worries – check your confirmation email for the WhatsApp group link.)

🎟 TICKETS:
— 🎫 With ELB Card: 4990 Ft
— 🎫 Without ELB Card: 5490 Ft
— 🕘 Last-minute / On-site: 6000 Ft (if available!)
💡 Yes, all drinks are included!

👉 Tickets & full info — link in bio

🎓🇬🇧 Study in the UK – 2025 Admissions Open!
Your dream of studying in the UK is now closer than ever!

Why chose us?
✅ Affordable Fee Structure
✅ With & Without IELTS Options
✅ Partial Scholarships Available
✅ Guaranteed Admission
✅ 100+ Partner Universities
✅ Quick & Professional Visa Support

📄 Required Documents:
Passport 
CNIC 
Academic Certificates (Matric/O-Level & Intermediate/A-Level)
Bachelor’s Degree (for Master’s applicants)
IELTS/English proficiency 
Passport Size Photograph (White Background)
Updated CV 
Statement of Purpose (SOP)
Experience Letter (if any)
Reference Letters

🇸🇦 From Riyadh to Osaka🇯🇵
Reunited with my dear Nora, 
a friend from my study abroad days in Switzerland.
She gifted me beautiful Bateel dates 
— so thoughtful as always.
Seeing how far she’s come, 
I couldn’t be more proud of her.
And just as I’m proud of her, 
I hope to become someone others can be proud of too.

スイス留学時代の友人ノラが万博のお仕事で大阪に！
去年も一昨年も会えてるのって何気にすごい。
私が彼女を誇りに思うように、 
私も誰かに誇られる人になりたいと思うのです。
建築の話(デンマーク熱は冷めない)も本の話も
デパ地下も全部楽しかった♥️
2030年のリヤドで行われる万博行きたい💕

✈️Thank You My Friends😁🇧🇷✨

The main reason I came to Brazil
was to meet the friends I made during my study abroad.
One year ago I started online language classes before going abroad.
That’s where I met some amazing people
and we made a promise to meet one day.
That special promise has finally come true.

Then my life in Canada began
and I met even more wonderful friends.
The places I wanted to visit
the people I wanted to see
and the feelings I had kept growing.

Brazil is where it all started.
I finished my program five months earlier than planned.
Because of that this trip became possible.

Plan B
But now I can say it clearly
Better than A :)

Things didn’t go exactly as planned
but the connections I made with people
became the most precious part of my journey.

To all the friends I reunited with
the ones who reached out
and everyone I met in Canada
this trip was made possible because of you.

Brazil was truly amazing.
The warm people the beautiful nature the delicious food
everything touched my heart.

Brazil is no longer a faraway country for me.
I will definitely come back someday.

I hope we stay connected.
And when you come to Japan
I’ll support you with all my heart
just like you did for me.

Thank you my friends.
Until we meet again.

Going abroad soon? Let’s make sure you don’t start off alone.

Studyabroadfriends is based on the idea of helping students who are going abroad to the same Erasmus city connect before arriving in their new city, through the concept: 📲 Tag us – we repost – you connect.
The idea came from our own experiences studying abroad. Moving to a new city can be exciting, but those first days can also feel lonely; exploring the city for the first time alone, drinking your first coffee alone, and wishing you already had someone to share it with.
That’s where studyabroadfriends comes in. Our goal is to help students connect in advance; ideally, even before boarding the plane. This way, you can already share the excitement, talk about your plans for the first week, and maybe you get along so well that you decide to move into a shared flat together!
So, if you're going abroad for a semester soon, follow this page and connect with people heading to the same city.
That’s the idea behind studyabroadfriends: to help you meet great people before day one.

學術交流，對未來發展十分重要‼️

很榮幸來到英國🇬🇧倫敦共融教育國際議會 🗞️

作為一個教育者，好好理解不同持份者的觀點，參考不同國家的教育方針和問題及解決方案，對於本國的教育發展很有意義和啟發。

很幸運地遇到香港教育局的職員，內地及海外不同國家主流學校班主任、教師、研究博士，一齊分享研究成果，以及探討多個教育議題。共融教育是現代教育中不可或缺，而且越來越有需求的一環。

caption:
📘 This or That? จบ ป.ตรี แล้ว...ไปทางไหนดี?
🎓 บางคนเรียนต่อ
💼 บางคนทำงาน
😶 บางคนสับสน ว่าจะไปทางไหนดีในยุคที่ทุกอย่างไม่แน่นอน
-----------------------------
🎓 THIS = เรียนต่อเลย 🎓 เรียนต่อโทเลย (Fresh Grad → Master)
✅ ถ้ารู้เป้าหมายชัด✅ อยากได้วุฒิเร็ว✅ พร้อมลุยเรียนต่อทันที
เหมาะกับคนที่...
🔴รู้แน่ชัดแล้วว่าจะไปสายงานไหน ต้องใช้วุฒิ (เช่น นักวิจัย นักวิชาการ งานราชการบางประเภท)
🔴ต้องการทุนเรียนต่อ (บางทุนให้เฉพาะจบใหม่)
🔴ยังไม่มีภาระการเงิน และอยากต่อเนื่องทางวิชาการทันที
ข้อดี:
✅ไม่หลุดจากโมเมนตัมการเรียน
✅มีเวลาเก็บวุฒิเร็วกว่า และใช้สมัครงานในตำแหน่งสูงได้เลย
✅บางประเทศให้สิทธิ์อยู่ต่อหลังเรียนจบได้ (เช่น แคนาดา อังกฤษ)
ข้อควรระวัง:
⭐อาจเรียนแบบทฤษฎีมากเกินไป เพราะไม่มีบริบทการทำงานจริง
⭐โอกาสในการ “ค้นพบตัวเอง” อาจยังน้อย
---------------------------------------------
💼 THAT =👨‍💼 ทำงานเก็บประสบการณ์ก่อน (1–3 ปี)
✅ ถ้ายังไม่แน่ใจจะเรียนอะไร✅ อยากรู้จักตัวเองผ่านการทำงาน✅ อยากเก็บเงิน วางแผนชีวิตก่อน
เหมาะกับคนที่...
✅ยังไม่แน่ใจว่าตัวเองอยากเรียนอะไร หรือทำอาชีพไหนจริงจัง
✅อยากใช้ประสบการณ์มาช่วยเลือกสาขาให้แม่น
✅ตั้งใจจะเรียนโทในสาย Business, MBA, Marketing, Tech หรือสายที่ "ประสบการณ์ทำงาน" เป็นปัจจัยสำคัญ
ข้อดี:
🔴รู้ว่าอะไรคือ “สิ่งที่อยากเจาะลึก” ก่อนจะเรียน
🔴มีโอกาสได้ทุนบางประเภทที่ขอให้มีประสบการณ์
🔴ได้เก็บเงินหรือรู้จักวางแผนการเงินเพื่อเรียนต่อเอง
ข้อควรระวัง:
⭐ถ้าไม่ได้วางแผนดี อาจติดสบาย และ “ไม่ได้กลับไปเรียน” อีกเลย
⭐อาจต้องเตรียมตัวเรียนหนักกว่าปกติ (เพราะห่างจากการเรียนมาสักพัก)
-------------------------
🧭 ไม่มีคำตอบที่ถูกที่สุด มีแค่ “คำตอบที่เหมาะกับคุณที่สุด”
🌍 จากนักเรียนแลกเปลี่ยน...สู่ผู้ใหญ่ในวันที่โลกเปลี่ยน
☂️SEP เริ่มต้นจากการ “ส่งน้องมัธยม” ไปเปิดโลกในต่างประเทศ
✅แต่วันนี้...เราได้เห็นน้อง ๆ หลายคน ที่เคยเดินทางในวัย 14–17 ปี
⭐เติบโต จบมหาวิทยาลัย และกำลังก้าวสู่โลกของ “การตัดสินใจชีวิตจริง ผ่านมาแล้วทั้งโควิด 👍ผ่านอุปสรรคทั้งจากภายในประเทศและนอกประเทศ
🥰แต่เรายังยืนอยู่ตรงนี้ได้ เพราะเราไม่หยุดพยายาม
🙏และเชื่อว่า…เราจะผ่านมันไปได้อีกแน่นอน

🎒✈ BUON VIAGGIO, NICOLE! 🇦🇷

È arrivato anche per Nicole il momento di partire: destinazione Argentina!
Un biglietto tra le mani e una valigia piena di sogni, curiosità e voglia di mettersi in gioco dall’altra parte del mondo 🌍✨

Mesi che si preannunciano intensi, tra accenti nuovi, abitudini diverse, orizzonti larghi e incontri che lasceranno il segno. Il primo passo è fatto — e che passo!

Ad accompagnarla in aeroporto c’erano le sue amiche — anche loro future studentesse di scambio — pronte a salutarla con sorrisi, abbracci e quell’energia speciale che solo chi sta per vivere la stessa avventura può capire 💛

Nicole, ti auguriamo di vivere questa esperienza fino in fondo. Noi ti seguiamo da qui, con il cuore che balla un po’ di tango 💃

Week 1 in Florence! 🍷✈️🍝🥰🇮🇹

WOW time flies when you’re having fun :) Honestly, it feels like I’ve been here forever already. I’m finally adjusting to the time change, feel like I somewhat know my way around, and actually have been go-go-go since the second we landed here😴

And the best part is that I know there is SOO much exploring left to do! I’m honestly really happy, and I’m doing a lot better than I expected in terms of this transition. It’s definitely very different from home life and college life, but I really do love it already☺️

I’m sure I’m in the “honeymoon phase” where it all seems perfect and eventually reality will set in. We had a week to explore and adjust before classes started, which was super nice to not rush into things, but I’m excited for some normalcy📚✏️

To beat this adjustment, or other similar changes, I’d definitely recommend a few quick tips…

1. Keep an open conversation. Whether that be with your roommates, your advisors, your people at home or people here, make sure to not bottle up your feelings. It’s normal to feel sad, anxious, scared, happy, and everything in between - so let yourself feel those feelings!

2. Take some alone time. I know it’s hard if you share a room or are exploring a brand new place, but take that time to explore on your own, journal out your feelings, take a longer shower than usual… whatever you need.

3. Try your best to get into some sort of normal routine. Whether that be attempting a normal sleep schedule, working out how you normally do, or prioritizing your meals, a routine makes the transition feel a lot less overwhelming. Do your best to create some normalcy in a world full of change.

4. Enjoy it!!!! Things are going to be different and THAT IS OK. Allow yourself to try new things & don’t compare your “new life” toooooo much to life at home, because naturally, they’re never going to be the same. 

And to wrap it all up, good luck to my fellow abroad people. Good luck to everyone back at school or staying home for the semester. Good luck to those who have graduated or those who still haven’t entered college. CHANGE IS FOR EVERYBODY - WE ALL GOT THIS 😊 LOVE U GUYS! ❤️

J'écrivais sur le post Facebook de l'époque que c'était incroyable d'aller étudier là bas, que j'hallucinais, en gros. J'avais jamais quitté le continent européen. 

Si vous vous posiez la question, oui la vie étudiante aux USA c'est comme dans les séries.

À 19 ans je pensais que quand je serai "grande" je travaillerai pour une très grande entreprise et que je serai toujours entre deux avions.

C'est à moitié vrai 😅 mon client en ce moment fait effectivement partie du CAC 40 mais je ne prends l'avion que pour les vacances et tant mieux 🫢

Maintenant au tour de @lxouis.olv de faire son semestre aux USA 💛

I got to Málaga 19/9-21 all the way from Gothenburg by train. It took 77 hours and was a rather painful trip with sleeping crumpled up on the train floor amongst luggage and long wait on the streets of Berlin as well as Paris. But it was also an interesting trips, which you can see parts from on my other account @aziiliza 💚🌃🚞

I am going to stay in Málaga until the end of February and therefore I think it's best to have a separate account for all the experiences I'll have here 🌊🌠🇪🇦

It feels strange to all of a sudden find oneself living in a different apartment, in a different city, in a different country with another culture, other people (lots of them) and a completely different school system.

I'm used to a bit chaos in Gothenburg, but this - so far - feels like a whole new level of that🤯🦧

The people are nice though, the sun is warm, the water is close and I feel my mood going pretty much up and down with the big adjustment it is to be in a completely different place.

☝️☝️☝️
Follow my mental as well as physical journey here!

#travel #malaga #life #abroad #homeabroad#place #broaden #your #home #and #mind #mental #physical #exhausted #school #university #chaos #fun #experience #student #newlife #train #climate #climatecare #follow #spain #uma #abroadsemester @utlandsstudier

Loving this vibe all around the city 😍
Hallo meine Lieben! Ich bin’s wieder und ich bin fertig mit allen Klausuren! Jetzt entspanne ich seit gestern und genieße wieder die Freiheit, das zu machen worauf ich Lust habe. Dennoch steht Mitte Juni noch eine Gruppenpräsentation an, aber das wird schon! Ansonsten realisiere ich, dass der Countdown nun rückwärts läuft sodass ich bald wieder in Deutschland bin. Also hab ich mir vorgenommen, mehr Freude an die Tage zu legen, dankbar die Zeit zu genießen und zu nutzen 🙋🏼‍♀️😊
Ich habe bereits heute übrigens einen neuen Blogpost hochgeladen ☺️schaut doch gerne auf meinem Blog vorbei 😌ich würde mich sehr freuen!
Ansonsten hoffe ich, eure Woche ist bis jetzt angenehm und ihr schafft das was ihr euch vorgenommen habt!
Alles Liebe, eure Andrea

Five advantages of travelling by train:
🚂 Rail transport is the most environment-friendly way to travel (Can't emphasise this strongly enough). 
🚂 Leave from the city center, arrive to the city center. 
🚂 Views, views, views. Need I say more? 
🚂 Waiting time on station before boarding tends to be max 1hr in advance if seats are numbered, otherwise just hop on. 
🚂 Many modern trains have plugs, WiFi and the seats tend to be comfortable. Overnight trains may have beds as well!
.
.
Cinco ventajas de viajar en tren:
🚂 El transporte ferroviario es la forma más ecológica de viajar (No puedo enfatizar esto lo suficiente).
🚂 Salís del centro de la ciudad, llegás al centro de la ciudad.
🚂 Vistas, vistas, vistas. ¿Necesito decir más?
🚂 El tiempo de espera en la estacion antes del embarque tiende a ser como máximo 1 hora antes si los asientos están numerados, sino solo subite. 
🚂 Muchos trenes modernos tienen enchufes, WiFi y los asientos tienden a ser cómodos. ¡Los trenes nocturnos también pueden tener camas!
.
.

ALL ABOUT STANFORD UNIVERSITY
@stanford 👉1. Ranks
Among the top 10 universities in the world.
Stanford university admissions are very
competitive with an acceptance rate of 5%. 👉2. Admisson Requirement
GPA : 4/ 5
SAT- 1500+/ 1600
TOEFL : 100+/ 120
IELTS : 7+/ 9
GMAT : 737+/ 800 👉3. Programs
Being one of the best universities in the world Stanford has a lot of courses to offer. Some of them are Bioengineering, Computer Science (CS), Earth, Energy, and Environmental Sciences (EARTH), Human Resource Management (HRMGT), etc. 👉4. Academic Fees
APPLICATION FEES : $90
UG FEES : $53,000 / annum
PG FEES : $70,000 / annum
ACCOMODATION : $20,000 / annum 👉5. Return of Investment
A person can earn upto an average of US$150,000 per year. 👉6. Social Life
With 81 Student Residences, 625+ Organized Student Groups, 11,000+ Students Living on campus, Stanford is the most popular choice among the student community.

Tandem Café: Outdoor Edition 🌳✨
Last Saturday, we gathered with 40–45 amazing people (and two wonderful dog companions 🐶🐶) for another language exchange — this time outdoors in Sonsbeek Park, Arnhem!

We practiced Dutch 🇳🇱, Spanish 🇪🇸, English 🇬🇧, Indonesian 🇮🇩, Chinese 🇨🇳, French 🇫🇷, and Italian .
We enjoyed great conversations, shared very nice food, and had music in the background. 🎶🥖🗣️

☀️ The weather was perfect (well… a little chilly before we wrapped up 🥶), and people came from Arnhem, Nijmegen, Westervoort, and even Germany. 🌍💬

📅 Next time — in September — we’ll be indoors 🏠. Stay tuned for details!

Tandem Café: Outdoor Edition 🌳✨
Afgelopen zaterdag kwamen we met 40–45 geweldige mensen (en twee lieve honden 🐶🐶) samen voor weer een taaluitwisseling — dit keer buiten in het Sonsbeekpark in Arnhem!

We oefenden Nederlands 🇳🇱, Spaans 🇪🇸, Engels 🇬🇧, Indonesisch 🇮🇩, Chinees 🇨🇳, Frans 🇫🇷 en Italiaans 🇮🇹.
Leuke gesprekken, heerlijk eten en gezellige muziek op de achtergrond. 🎶🥖🗣️

☀️ Het weer was perfect (oké… een beetje fris tegen het einde 🥶), en deelnemers kwamen uit Arnhem, Nijmegen, Westervoort en zelfs Duitsland. 🌍💬

📅 Volgende keer — in september — zijn we binnen 🏠. Houd ons in de gaten voor meer details!

🍕 𝐓𝐢𝐞̣̂𝐜 𝐏𝐢𝐳𝐳𝐚 𝐭𝐨̛́𝐢 đ𝐚̂𝐲! 🎉
Hãy cùng nhau tạo nên một ngày thứ Sáu này không thể quên! Cùng tham gia ngay 𝐓𝐢𝐞̣̂𝐜 𝐏𝐢𝐳𝐳𝐚 𝐬𝐢𝐞̂𝐮 𝐜𝐡𝐢𝐥𝐥, được ăn pizza free thoả thích và vô vàn trò chơi vui nhộn! 🍕🥤

👉 𝐂𝐨́ 𝐧𝐡𝐮̛̃𝐧𝐠 𝐠𝐢̀ 𝐭𝐡𝐮́ 𝐯𝐢̣?

𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐏𝐢𝐳𝐳𝐚 🍕: Những hương vị không thể thiếu (hỡi các fan của dứa, chúng mình có pizza dứa cho các bạn đấy!)

The Star Ferry 天星碼頭 at Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon (front end) and The Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre 香港會議展覽中心 at Wan Chai, Hong Kong Island (far end). 

The Star Ferry 天星小輪 is a passenger ferry service operator and tourist attraction in Hong Kong. Its principal routes carry passengers across Victoria Harbour, Hong Kong Island, and Kowloon. The service is operated by the Star Ferry Company, which was founded in 1888 as the Kowloon Ferry Company, and adopted its present name in 1898.

🌍✨ Strangers Who Became Friends ✈️💬
On a recent trip to Barcelona 🇪🇸, my client met Lucas completely by chance. She was figuring out which 🚇 metro line went to the 🏖️ beach when he overheard and offered directions. Turns out, he was visiting from Argentina 🇦🇷 and heading the same way!

What started as a quick chat on the train 🚆 turned into an unforgettable afternoon exploring seaside markets 🛍️, sharing delicious tapas 🍤🍷, and swapping travel stories under the Spanish sun ☀️. By the end of the day, they’d exchanged numbers 📱 and promised to keep in touch.

That was just a few months ago and now they’re already talking about planning another adventure together 🌏🧳✈️.

💬 Question for you: Have YOU ever met someone while traveling who became a lifelong friend? Drop your story below! 💛

#TravelFriendship #StrangersToFriends #TravelBuddies #TravelMemories #BarcelonaTravel #SoloTravelStories #MakingFriendsAbroad #AdventureAwaits #TravelGoals #TravelInspiration #MeetTheWorld #FriendshipGoals #TapasTime #WanderlustVibes #TravelMoreWorryLess #EpicTravelStories

I’ve always found friendship abroad to be… complicated.
Not because I don’t want it, but because for me, friendship has always meant something deep.
Connection. Trust. Being there in both the happy and the heavy moments.

And that kind of bond takes time — especially when you’re far from “home.”

When you live far from home, those friendships matter even more.
They’re the people who make a new place feel like yours,
the ones who fill the space your family would have filled if they were closer.

Maybe that’s why these meetings in Sicily felt so special.
Because they weren’t just catch-ups.
They were reminders that real friendship can grow in unexpected places — and last, even when borders and years get in the way.

🤍 To the ones who make time…

.
.
.
.
.

Лето - лучшая пора для ❤️ свиданий🤗
🌟Вот несколько идей для первого свидания в Мюнхене и не только:). 

🏞️ Spaziergang im Grünen / Прогулка на природе
Ein entspannter Spaziergang im Park, am See oder Flussufer bietet eine ruhige Atmosphäre zum Kennenlernen. Bewegung hilft, Nervosität abzubauen, und die Natur liefert Gesprächsanlässe. / Прогулка в парке, у озера или вдоль берега реки создаёт расслабленную атмосферу для знакомства. Движение помогает снять напряжение, а природа даёт поводы для разговора.

☕ Gemütliches Café oder Eisdiele / Уютное кафе или кафе-мороженое. Ein klassischer Treffpunkt für ein erstes Date: Bei Kaffee, Tee oder Eis kann man sich in ruhiger Umgebung unterhalten – locker, ungezwungen und mit Ausstiegsmöglichkeit bei fehlender Chemie. /Классическое место для первого свидания: за чашкой кофе или мороженым можно общаться в спокойной обстановке —расслабленно, свободно и с непринужденной возможностью уйти, если не возникнет «химия».

🍹 Bar mit Atmosphäre / Бар с атмосферой
Eine stilvolle Bar mit ruhiger Musik, gedimmtem Licht und angenehmer Umgebung eignet sich gut für Gespräche – allerdings eher für abendliche Dates. / Стильный бар с тихой музыкой, приглушенным освещением и приятной обстановкой хорошо подходит для бесед и вечерних свиданий.

🎭 Kultur erleben: Museum, Galerie oder Ausstellung / Культурные впечатления: музей, галерея или выставка Ideal für gemeinsame Interessen oder als Gesprächsanstoß: Kunst, Geschichte oder interaktive Ausstellungen bieten Inhalt, ohne dass man sich durchgehend unterhalten muss. / Идеально для людей с общими интересами или в качестве повода для беседы: искусство и история предоставляют темы для разговора, не требуя постоянного общения.

🎬 Open-Air-Kino oder Planetarium / Кинотеатр под открытым небом или планетарий
Besonders charmant, wenn man eine gemütliche, aber nicht zu intensive Stimmung möchte. Ideal, um später über den Film oder das Gesehene ins Gespräch zu kommen. / Особенно романтично, если хочется создать уютную, но не слишком напряжённую атмосферу. 
💖 Выбирайте то, что ближе вам и вашему партнеру, и пусть ваше первое свидание станет началом красивой истории!

caption:
Expat friendship is basically mum-Tinder.
You match… you meet… and then you go home and overthink every word you said 🙃

Sometimes it’s awkward. Sometimes the vibe is off.
Other times it’s effortless — like you’ve known each other for years.

But just like dating, it takes a few “meh” connections, a couple of dry chats, and maybe even a ghosting or two… before you find your people.

The ones who get it.
The friends who’ll text back, who’ll say “come over, don’t worry about the mess.”
The ones who feel like family even if you’ve only known them a few months.

So if you’re still swiping through the friendship pool, hang in there.
There are people out there who will love you for your weird, your tired, your leggings and all.

It can be daunting landing in a new country and not knowing anyone. You're not alone in that feeling (so many of us have been there). We get it. 🥺

The good news? Making connections in a new place can be one of the most rewarding parts of the journey. 🌟

Here are some gentle, genuine tips to help you find your people:

🧩 Join local groups or clubs
Look for meetup groups, sports teams, hobby circles, or language exchanges. Platforms like Meetup, Facebook groups, or even Discord servers for locals and expats can be great places to start.

🎨 Take a class
Sign up for yoga, cooking, art, or dance classes. Shared activities give you a natural way to meet people and start conversations.

🫶🏻 Say yes to invitations
Even if you're unsure or feel out of your element, showing up matters. Dinners, festivals, small hangouts - they often lead to unexpected connections.

📱 Try friendship and event apps
Some apps that help you meet new people:
Bumble BFF - for making platonic friends
Meetup - for finding interest-based events

🎉 Go to cultural or community events
Attend local holidays, food markets, concerts, or public celebrations. They're often full of relaxed, curious people - the perfect setting for meeting someone new!

⏳ Be patient
Real friendships take time. Just keep showing up, being kind, and staying open. The right people tend to show up when you're consistently around.

 #AllianceAbroad #USA #MakingFriendsAbroad

1️⃣Viele finden den August ideal zum Reisen, denn man hat oft Urlaub und das Wetter ist stabil / Август считается идеальным временем для путешествий, так как часто бывают отпуска и погода обычно стабильная. Allerdings sind die Preise für Flüge und Hotels in dieser Zeit besonders hoch / Однако цены на перелёты и отели в это время особенно высоки. Trotzdem buchen viele ihre Reise im August, da ihnen nur in diesem Monat Urlaub möglich ist / Тем не менее, многие бронируют поездку именно на август, так как отпуск возможен только в этом месяце.

2️⃣Einige reisen nicht gern im August, weil die Kosten viel höher sind als in anderen Monaten / Некоторые не любят путешествовать в августе, поскольку расходы значительно выше, чем в другие месяцы. Deshalb warten sie lieber bis September, denn dann wird es günstiger und es gibt mehr Angebote / Поэтому предпочитают подождать до сентября, так как тогда становится дешевле и появляется больше предложений. Wenn man flexibel ist, kann man außerhalb der Ferienzeiten viel Geld sparen. / Если иметь гибкий график, можно сэкономить много денег, путешествуя вне сезона.

3️⃣Obwohl die meisten wissen, dass der August teuer ist, verreisen viele trotzdem / Хотя большинство знает, что август — дорогой месяц, многие всё равно уезжают в отпуск. Da viele Unternehmen im Sommer Betriebsferien haben, bleibt oft keine andere Möglichkeit / Так как у многих компаний летом корпоративный отпуск, часто не остаётся другого выбора. Allerdings versucht man, durch Frühbuchung oder Last-Minute-Angebote günstiger zu reisen / Однако люди экономят, бронируя заранее или пользуясь горящими предложениями.
ПРОДОЛЖЕНИЕ В КОММЕНТАРИЯХ⬇️

4️⃣Sobald die Schulferien beginnen, steigen die Preise für Reisen stark an / Как только начинаются школьные каникулы, цены на поездки резко возрастают. Wenn man mit Kindern reist, bleibt oft nur der August, auch wenn die Preise dann besonders hoch sind. / Для путешествий с детьми, часто остаётся только август, даже если в это время особенно дорого. caption:
Making Friends in Germany: A Journey Worth Taking

Moving from India to Germany opens the door to a completely different social world. It’s exciting—but let’s be honest, it comes with challenges, especially when it comes to building meaningful friendships.

German communication is often very direct. It’s not meant to be unfriendly—it’s simply about clarity. Once you understand this cultural nuance, it becomes much easier to connect and feel included.

Here are some practical ways to grow your social circle in Germany:
 • Join local clubs (Vereine): Whether it’s sports, music, or volunteering, this is where many friendships begin.
 • Language meetups: Practice German and connect with others who are also navigating a new country.
 • Attend festivals and community events: Local markets and cultural fairs are great places to meet people and understand German life.
 • Use your work or university network: Small conversations can grow into lasting bonds.
 • Stay open and approachable: Friendships in Germany may take time to build, but they’re often strong and lasting.
 • Join expat and Indo-German communities: These spaces offer support, understanding, and opportunities to connect across cultures.

Settling into a new country takes time—but with patience and openness, you’ll find your circle.

Have you made strong friendships in Germany? What worked best for you? Share your thoughts with the Indo-German community.

🌐 Read more at www.indo-germanspectrum.com

caption:
🇩🇪Поговорим о радости? А именно о том, как она звучит по немецки🤗

1. „sich freuen auf“ (Akkusativ) Bedeutung: Man freut sich auf etwas, das in der Zukunft liegt. / Человек радуется чему-то (с нетерпением ждет чего-то), что произойдёт в будущем.
➡️ Du wartest auf etwas und bist schon jetzt glücklich, weil es bald passiert. / Ты ждёшь чего-то и уже сейчас счастлив, потому что это скоро случится. Beispiele (Sommer genießen): Ich freue mich auf den Sommerurlaub am Meer.
➡️ Der Urlaub ist noch nicht da, aber ich denke daran und bin schon jetzt glücklich. / Отпуск ещё не начался, но я думаю о нём и уже радуюсь.
Wir freuen uns auf die warmen, sonnigen Tage.
➡️ Diese Tage kommen bald – und das macht uns schon jetzt gute Laune. / Эти тёплые, солнечные дни ещё впереди, и это уже поднимает нам настроение.
Die Kinder freuen sich auf das Eisessen im Park.
➡️ Das Eis gibt es später, aber die Vorstellung daran macht die Kinder glücklich. / Мороженое дети получат позже, но сама мысль об этом их радует.

2. „sich freuen über“ (Akkusativ) Bedeutung: Man freut sich über etwas, das jetzt passiert oder schon passiert ist. Etwas ist da / ist passiert – und du bist deshalb froh. / Что-то уже есть / случилось – и это делает тебя счастливым.
Beispiele (Sommer genießen): Ich freue mich über die Sonne heute.
➡️ Die Sonne scheint gerade – und das gefällt mir jetzt. / Сегодня светит солнце – и мне это нравится прямо сейчас.
Wir freuen uns über das schöne Wetter am Wochenende.
➡️ Das schöne Wetter war am Wochenende da – und das macht uns immer noch glücklich. / Погода в выходные была хорошей – и это нас до сих пор радует.
Die Kinder freuen sich über ihr kühles Eis.
➡️ Sie haben das Eis schon bekommen und genießen es jetzt. / Дети уже получили мороженое и сейчас с удовольствием его едят.

📝 Merktipp: / Подсказка для запоминания:
„auf“ = ZUKUNFT: Ich warte noch darauf. / „auf“ = БУДУЩЕЕ: Я этого ещё жду. „über“ = GEGENWART oder VERGANGENHEIT: Es ist da oder war da. / „über“ = НАСТОЯЩЕЕ или ПРОШЛОЕ: Это уже есть или было.

Сохраняйте пост, чтобы не забыть. И пусть в вашей жизни будет как можно больше поводов для выражения радости❤️🤗

Choosing a school abroad wasn’t always easy. When we first moved, there were so many unknowns—language, curriculum, teaching style, how the kids would adjust… all of it felt overwhelming. For our youngest, we chose a private school that first year, hoping it would offer a softer landing. And while it served its purpose at the time, we made the switch to a public school in the second year—and that’s when things really clicked.

It wasn’t just about academics anymore. Public school became the place where our kids started to feel at home. It’s where they found real friends—the kind that have become a part of their everyday lives. And for us as parents, it became a gateway into the local community too.

Looking back, that decision was a turning point. School wasn’t just school—it helped us build a sense of belonging in a new country.

📍Würzburg, Germany 🇩🇪 | Day 2 – Friends, Food & Free Rides!

Day 2 kicked off with one big question: “How should I get to the event venue?” It was just 3.5 km away—walkable in theory, but not when you're running late 🙈

Tried Uber... surprise! It doesn’t work here. 😅 Asked the hotel reception, and they kindly called a local cab for me. Crisis averted ✅

I’ll skip the event details here (Insta isn’t really for conference recaps, is it?). But by the end of the day—I had made a few new friends! Had to, really—who else would click my pictures otherwise? 📸😂

Post-event vibes took us back to the beautiful bridge I visited yesterday. Then we headed to a cozy little place for dinner. The staff was super friendly, the wine was flowing (not for me though—I finally got my hands on still water 💧after an entire day without it 😅), and the food? Delicious… except the meat. European meat and I don’t vibe. 🥩🚫

Wrapped up the evening exploring the city, learning how to use the bus and tram system (spoiler: I ended up riding them for free! 🙈), and soaking in little details about German life—warm people, subtle humor, quiet pride in culture and food.

Day 2 was all about connection, curiosity, and carbs. More tomorrow. 👋

🇵🇹 Erasmus+ v Ostravě = týden plný zážitků! 🎒🌍

Navštívili jsme Svět techniky 🧪, prošli historické centrum Ostravy 🏙️, obdivovali výhled z hradu Hukvaldy 🏰 a ochutnali štramberské uši ve Štramberku 👂🍪.
Zážitek? Jízda na motokárách 🏁🔥 a výlet do Prahy s orlojem, hradem a trdelníkem! 🇨🇿❤️
Děkujeme hostitelským rodinám za péči a skvělou atmosféru. Díky vám se studenti cítili jako doma 🏡🥰

🕵️‍♀️ Ljubljana Detective Hunt: Tujim študentom se je mesto razkrilo skozi zabavne uganke!

V soboto, 24. 5. 2025, smo na FUDŠ organizirali prav poseben dogodek za naše mednarodne študente – Ljubljana Detective Hunt! 🔍

Središče Ljubljane se je za en dan spremenilo v prizorišče iskanja skritih namigov, zanimivih nalog in zabavnih ugank. Šest pogumnih študentov se je podalo na raziskovalno pustolovščino, kjer je vsaka pravilno rešena uganka razkrila novo lokacijo – in ob tem tudi nove prijatelje. 🇸🇮🌍

Ob prijetnem vzdušju, smehu in ekipnem duhu so udeleženci odkrivali znane in manj znane kotičke prestolnice. Zmagovalna ekipa je domov odnesla darilne vrečke s slovenskimi dobrotami, vsi sodelujoči pa so prejeli FUDŠ goodie bag s presenečenji. 🎁✨

Imeli smo se res fino – in že komaj čakamo naslednje druženje! Hvala vsem, ki ste bili z nami! 💚

#ljubljanadetectivehunt #erasmusfuds #studyinljubljana #fudscommunity #studentlife #internationalstudents #erasmusfun #fudsconnects #zabavnostudij

Orientation for Batch 2025-2027, Day 1
--
The Orientation Program for the newly admitted MBA students Batch 2025-2027 was a vibrant and inspiring start to their management journey 🎓✨. The session was graced by the Managing Trustee, Shri Pragnesh K. Shastri, Director Dr. Neha Patel, and Additional Director Dr. Supriya Bhutiani 🙏, who warmly welcomed 🤝 the first-year students and shared valuable insights into the institute’s vision, values, and expectations 💡📚. They emphasized the importance of integrity, innovation, and industry readiness 🚀, encouraging students to make the most of the academic and co-curricular opportunities ahead. At SLIMS, we firmly believe that an orientation program plays a vital role in facilitating a smooth transition into a new academic environment 🏫🌟. They help students understand the curriculum, campus culture, and support systems 📖, while also building a sense of community with peers and faculty 👥💬. It sets the tone for a positive, purposeful, and productive learning experience over the next two years 📆💪.
--
The Orientation Program will span across five engaging days 📅🎯, each thoughtfully curated to offer a unique and enriching experience 🌈 for the newly admitted MBA students. From insightful sessions by industry experts 🗣️💼 and interactive faculty introductions 👩‍🏫👨‍🏫 to ice-breaking activities 🎲, campus tours 🚶‍♂️🏛️, and career readiness workshops 🛠️, each day will bring something new and exciting 🎉. This multi-day format will ensure a gradual and meaningful immersion into the academic culture 📚, preparing students not just for the classroom 🏫 but also for leadership, collaboration, and lifelong learning 🌟🤝.
--

Orientation 2025 – A Grand Success! 🌸🎉

From inspiring talks to hands-on experiences, Orientation 2025 set the perfect stage for our first-year students’ journey at SHS, Sushant University!

➡️6th Aug: Kicked off with “Your Journey Begins: From Curiosity to Caregiver”, fun JAM sessions, quizzes, scope exploration, and even an industrial visit for Pharmacy students.
➡️7th Aug: Allied Health students gained real-world exposure at Marengo Asia Hospital, Faridabad, alongside interactive sessions and challenges.
➡️8th Aug: A powerful closing day with an address by our Dean Sir, sessions on AI in Healthcare & Mental Health, pledge-taking, and a vibrant Creative Showcase.

Here’s to new beginnings, boundless learning, and a future full of possibilities! 💫

Orientation 2025 , One year ago I walked into JECRC University for my MBA with a head full of dreams and a heart curious to explore.
Back then, I didn’t know how much this journey would shape me — but looking back, this year has been nothing short of transformative. It’s given me lessons, experiences, and perspectives that will last a lifetime.

Today, as I see the same spark in the eyes of the new batch — that hunger to achieve, to explore, to find themselves — I can’t help but feel inspired all over again.

And what a way for them to start — not with just an orientation, but with a lineup of legends who’ve redefined what’s possible:

🔹 Sridhar Vembu – Founder, Zoho Corp valued ₹1.04 lakh crore (approximately $12.5 billion USD)
The man who built a billion-dollar tech empire without VC funding and is now transforming rural India through innovation.

🔹 Raj Shamani – Entrepreneur & Creator 
From selling soaps at 16 to becoming one of India’s loudest voices for youth entrepreneurship.

🔹 Lucky Bisht – Ex-R.A.W. Agent & Black Cat Commando
Once India’s most dangerous man, now an author and inspiration for grit & discipline.

🔹 Gaurav Taneja (Flying Beast) – YouTuber, Pilot, Fitness Icon 
From flying planes to inspiring millions online — proof that passion can be your profession.

🔹 Vineet Gupta – Co-founder, Ashoka University 
The visionary who built one of India’s leading universities from scratch.

If year one taught me anything, it’s that growth isn’t just about lectures and grades — it’s about the people you meet, the stories you hear, and the spark you choose to keep alive.”

📘 Day 1 & Day 2 Recap – Learning, Building, and Moving Forward

Yesterday, we explored the foundations of Safe from Harm in Scouting through engaging sessions led by learned resource speakers. 🧠✨ We discussed the meaning and importance of safeguarding, reviewed global and regional progress 🌍📊, and learned how to strengthen frameworks in our own NSOs—from adult recruitment and training 🧑‍🏫, to stakeholder mapping 🤝, and monitoring & evaluation 📋.

Day 1 ended on a high note with a warm Welcoming Dinner 🍽🎉🤝, bringing participants and guests together over laughter, good food, and cross-border friendships.

Day 2 moved into practical exercises—sharing NSO best practices 🌟, defining and identifying safeguarding concerns 🚩, designing tailored reporting procedures 🧩📂, and working on S.M.A.R.T. goals 🎯 to shape action plans for each NSO. Teams wrapped up by presenting their roadmaps 🗺 to strengthen safeguarding in their organizations.

✨ Tonight, we look forward to the vibrant and colourful International Night 🌏🎶💃—a celebration of Scouting spirit through culture, music, and friendship!

We’re halfway through—let’s stay united and committed to making Scouting safer for every young person. 💙🌱👥

📘 第一及第二天回顧

昨天，大家透過多個環節深入認識 「童軍中的保護免受傷害（Safe from Harm）」 🧠🛡，由亞太區資深講者帶領，探討保障的重要性 ✅、地區與全球的發展 🌏📈，以及如何加強各自總會的保障框架 🧱，內容涵蓋成人招募與培訓 🧑‍🏫、持份者合作 🤝 及監察和評估 📋。

晚上，我們在三軍會舉行歡迎晚宴 🍽🎉🤝，來自不同地區的朋友帶著源源不絕的歡笑聲，把握機會交流和享受美食，同時建立跨越國界的友誼。

第二日重點放在應用和實踐 🔧，包括分享各地童軍總會的經驗 🌟、界定保障關注事項 🚩、設計報告機制 📂📝，並透過個案分組演練 🧩🗣，加強應變能力。下午，參加者制定 S.M.A.R.T. 目標 🎯，並規劃屬於自己總會的行動計劃藍圖 🗺✨。

今晚將迎來令人期待色彩繽紛的國際之夜 🌏🎶💃，一起以文化、音樂和友誼慶祝童軍精神！

轉眼間，工作坊已經進入下半部分，讓我們繼續攜手，為每位童軍打造更安全的成長環境 💙🌱👥。

🇲🇽 Taco Party! 🌮
Today we had a special guest from Mexico – Lino – who treated us to an incredible taco feast! 🌶️🍗🧅
He prepared tacos with chicken, bell peppers, onions, and delicious frijoles refritos (refried beans) – the perfect combination of flavor and comfort. 🫶

Guests from🇿🇦🇦🇷🇨🇴🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇪🇲🇦gathered around the table, sharing stories, laughs, and great food.

We regularly host cooking events, and we'd love to showcase your country's cuisine too! If you’re interested in cooking for a future event, just talk to us at the front desk. 🍽️✨

International Student Meet Up: TODAY! 😍👋🏾

🗓️ Thursday 19th October from 4-5pm in the SU Lounge!

Session 4: Cultural Societies Meetup

Join us for an evening of cultural exchange; learn more about the cultural societies we have at the University of Plymouth and how you can get involved!

📸 These sessions are run by your elected 2023/24 SU President, Tonari Arikekpar (pictured).

--------------------------------

What is the International Student Meet Up? 🤔

Join us every Thursday evening to make new friends, share experiences, and build a strong international student community. Together, we'll create lasting memories and support each other's journey in the UK! 

The "International Students Meet-Up" is a series of events that caters to the needs of international students who might have missed out on the International Welcome Week.

This initiative is not just a collection of events but a cohesive platform that fosters community-building, provides crucial information, and offers a warm welcome to international students from diverse backgrounds. 

We would love to see you there! 👋🏿

@plymuni

"🌍 Connecting Cultures, Building Bridges 🤝✈️

At IIT Hyderabad's International Relations Cell, we believe that diversity is not just about where you come from but about where we're all going together. That's why we recently organized a fantastic meet-up for all our international students on campus!

This event was just the beginning of many more international adventures and cultural exchanges to come. We're excited to see how these connections will blossom into lifelong friendships and collaborations. Together, we'll make IIT Hyderabad not just a place for academic growth but also a hub for cultural exchange and global understanding.

Stay tuned for updates on our upcoming international events, where we'll continue to bridge the gaps, celebrate our diversity, and create unforgettable memories. 🌏🤩🌟

#GlobalIITH #InternationalStudentMeetup #CulturalExchange #IITHCommunity"

caption:
Our final tip for creating and maintaining new habits is about celebrating.⁠
It's great to celebrate along the way as you are able to maintain your habit. Maybe after 2 weeks, 1 month and beyond you can celebrate your progress in building and maintaining a new habit.⁠
.⁠
We hope that you have learnt something new to help you with creating new habits and keeping them up. Let us know in the comments what new habit you are hoping to start.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.#habits #internationalstudentmeetup #personaldevelopment #careergoals #studygoals #transformyourmind #wordstoinspire #mindsetmastery #becomeabetteryou #changeyourlifestyle #achieveyourgoals #reachyourgoals #empoweryourself #findyourpurpose #careerdevelopment #studyuk #britishenglish #internationalstudent #besuccessful #studyabroadlife #fridaymotivation #fridayfeeling #FridayFunday #FeelGoodFriday

We continue this week with our second tip for learning a new habit. Now that you've thought about and chosen the habit you want to maintain, remember to keep track of your progress. You could use a calendar and tick off the days that you do the habit. As the weeks go on, you can look back and see how well you're doing. ⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.#habits #internationalstudentmeetup #personaldevelopment #careergoals #studygoals #transformyourmind #wordstoinspire #mindsetmastery #becomeabetteryou #changeyourlifestyle #achieveyourgoals #reachyourgoals #empoweryourself #findyourpurpose #careerdevelopment #studyuk #britishenglish #internationalstudent #besuccessful #studyabroadlife #WellnessWednesday #WednesdayWisdom #HumpDay #WonderfulWednesday

Do you want to learn a new habit this summer? Maybe its to read for 30 minutes every night or practice a new skill each day. This week we'll be giving some tips to help you succeed at creating and maintaining a new habit. ⁠
.⁠
There may be lots of habits you want to start, but it's best to start with just one. What is the one habit that you want to start? ⁠
.⁠
Don't forget to write it down somewhere where you can see it daily!⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠

If you're a football fan and also learning English, then our final podcast recommendation might be perfect for you! Premier Skills English is a podcast that combines football news with learning English. ⁠
.⁠
Each episode can range from easy to hard difficulty. It covers topics such as mascots, disagreeing and match bans. Run by the British Council and Premier League, this is a reliable way to build up your sports vocabulary.⁠
.⁠
We hope that you have discovered some new podcasts this week. Let us know if there are any podcasts you'd recommend for learning English.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠

For our second podcast recommendation, we're sharing "You Don't Say?!" ( @podcastyoudontsay ). It's a podcast where you can practise your English with real English conversation about life around the world, cultural differences and surprising travel experiences. ⁠
.⁠
Episodes have covered topics such as bread, superstitions and summer. The hosts of this podcast are two English teachers who also speak a range of different languages.⁠
.⁠
Check back on Friday for our final podcast recommendation.⁠
.⁠

.⁠

This week we're highlighting 3 podcasts that we think are great for helping you to learn and improve your English.⁠
.⁠
First up is the BBC Learning English Drama podcast. Each episode features a story which is being retold in a way that is fun and entertaining. The current series is going through the popular story of Alice and Wonderland. New short episodes are released weekly so there's plenty of time to catch up. ⁠
.⁠
Check back on Wednesday for our next podcast suggestion.
.
.
.
.

Is there a new hobby that you'd like to give a try? Why not have a go at this new hobby using English? For example maybe you'd like to learn some photography skills to take better photos for Instagram. Sites like Future Learn have free and paid for courses for lots of different skills and hobbies.
. 
That's the last of our tips from @confidentenglishwithabigail to help you practise your English. Next week we will be having lots of free online events where you can practise and improve your English. Look out for more information on Monday! 
. 
.

Podcasts are becoming more and more popular with English learners. You can not only improve your English but also learn something about topics that you're interested in. Some other benefits of podcasts are: you'll improve your confidence when it comes to understanding native and non-native speakers, you'll improve your pronunciation and you can listen anytime and anywhere.
One podcast that's especially for English learners is @podcastyoudontsay where you can hear all about life around the world, cultural differences and travel experiences.
. 
. 
.

This week we're sharing tips to help you improve your English! 
. 
Card and board games can be a fun way to practise English and you can be as imaginative as you want. For example if you play UNO with a friend you could ask them a question in English every time they put a certain colour/number card down.
. 
Don't forget our free online events are also great opportunities to practise your English and meet new people. See our stories to see what's on this week. 
. 
. 
. 
.
