As you work towards completing your goal, it's great to celebrate the little achievements along the way. This can be a great boost to your confidence and will allow you feel a sense of achievement. ⁠
.⁠
A good way to approach this is to reward yourself after completing the smaller tasks that lead up to the big goal that you set yourself. Maybe it's making your favourite hot drink or going to the cinema. Celebrate however you like!⁠
.⁠
That's the last of our "How to set good goals" posts. We hope that you have learnt something new about goal setting. If you want to share your goals, let us know in the comments.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.#internationalstudentmeetup #personaldevelopment #careergoals #studygoals #transformyourmind #wordstoinspire #mindsetmastery #becomeabetteryou #changeyourlifestyle #achieveyourgoals #reachyourgoals #empoweryourself #findyourpurpose #careerdevelopment #studyuk #britishenglish #internationalstudent #besuccessful #studyabroadlife #fridaymotivation #fridayfeeling #FridayFunday #FeelGoodFriday

Our second tip for setting good goals, is to make sure to set an achievable deadline.⁠
📅⁠
Setting a deadline means that you have an end date to work towards and it can help you stay focused. It also means that you can set smaller tasks with dates that lead up to your big deadline.⁠
📅⁠
Try and be specific with your dates, for example would be: "I want to achieve this goal by at least 31st October 2020."⁠
📅⁠
On Friday we'll be sharing the final tip for setting good goals.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
#internationalstudentmeetup #personaldevelopment #careergoals #studygoals #transformyourmind #wordstoinspire #mindsetmastery #becomeabetteryou #changeyourlifestyle #achieveyourgoals #reachyourgoals #empoweryourself #findyourpurpose #careerdevelopment #studyuk #britishenglish #internationalstudent #besuccessful #studyabroadlife #WellnessWednesday #WednesdayWisdom #HumpDay #WonderfulWednesday

This week we are going to be looking our how you can set and achieve goals in work and study. ⁠
⬇⁠
Our first tip is to be specific about what it is you want to achieve. The more specific you are, the more likely you will be able to measure your progress. For example a bad example of a non-specific goal would be: "I want get better at English." ⁠
A better and more specific example would be: "I want to be able to have a conversation in English for 20 minutes without needing to use Google Translate." ⁠
⬇⁠
Once you have figured out your specific goal, make sure to write it down so that you can reflect on it regularly. ⁠
⬇⁠
Check back on Wednesday for our second post about setting good goals.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠

Abigail has been a member of the team at International Meetup since it started. Her passion for the International Student community also plays a part in her job where she teaches English. . 
If you would like to join in with any of our events, follow us on Instagram to stay informed or join our meetup group. Link in the bio.
.

.

Time for some throwback photos! Firstly, Sunny (on the left) and Andrew (on the right). . 
Sunny, who is from Hong Kong, has been attending International Meetup events since we started. He's taught us a lot about Hong Kong culture and he's definitely someone you want to get to know. . 
Based in Manchester, Andrew is one of the team at International Student Meetup. He's filled with enthusiasm for seeing our meetup community grow. . 
We have had an amazing time meeting students from all over the world since we started International Student Meetup Manchester. This week we'll be sharing some throwback photos with our students. .

Don't feel like you need to be at a screen 8 hours per day.  We are made for interaction!  Real face to face interaction. At some point in the day, take some time to see someone else. Lunch with your housemate, a short walk in the park with a friend or a phone call with a family member. This will boost you, keep you alert and motivated for a strong working day. ⁠
.⁠
This is the final tip we have for you to help with working from home. We hope that you've learnt something new and how you can work more productively at home. ⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠

If you're anything like me, your work might take over your entire bedroom or lounge or wherever you're working. Papers, notes, tech... all over the place! The chaos can confuse us. Try to set up your workspace in the morning and clear it in the evening. This will help your brain 'switch-on' to start work and 'switch-off' to finish work.⁠
.⁠
Abigail from @confidentenglishwithabigail shows us how she packs away and sets up her desk.⁠

Students from all around the world have been joining in with our online events. From France 🇨🇵, to Romania 🇷🇴, to Spain 🇪🇦!
. 
You can join our Zoom call  between 5.30pm and 6.30pm UK time for 5, 10 minutes or even longer.
.
Maybe you're feeling alone at this time and need some company. Maybe you'd like to discuss something that's been on your mind or you simply just want a chance to practice your English. Everyone is welcome.
.
Message, comment or see the link in the description for more information and to sign up.

We're meeting up online today with international students from all over the world! Pour yourself a drink and log in to an hour of great conversation and fun.
.
This is a wonderful opportunity to connect with people from different countries. Don't miss out on this chance to receive some  hope and encouragement.
.
Want to join us? Let us know if you are coming by:
⬇Commenting below
💬Sending a direct message
✏Signing up using the link on our bio.

Join us this Wednesday for the first of our "Around the Water Cooler" events.
.
The idea came from people meeting by chance at the water cooler in their office or place of study, taking a break and having some informal conversation.
.
You can join our Zoom call at anytime for 5, 10 minutes or even longer to have a relaxed conversation between 5.30pm and 6.30pm UK time.
.
Maybe you're feeling alone at this time and need some company, maybe you'd like to discuss something that's been on your mind or you'd simply like a moment to practice your English. Everyone is welcome.
.
Message, comment or see the link in the description for more information.

It's been a tough few weeks and we know the importance of reaching out and connecting with other people. As the UK and the rest of the world takes measures to keep everyone safe, we have decided to create some online events so that you can be encouraged, hopeful and connected wherever you are.
.
You'll be able to hang out and chat with others, join in with games, practice your English and have meaningful discussions.
.
Keep an eye on our page to find out when and what we'll be hosting.
.
Take care of yourself everyone. ❤️

Thankfully we had some good weather on Saturday which meant that we could complete our Bridgewater Canal Walk. We were joined by enthusiastic walkers  from countries such as #Italy and #Nigeria. After walking for just over 2 hours, we all stopped for a drink at a coffee shop and some much needed rest!
.
Our next walk will be at Heaton Park on the Saturday 18th April from 1.30pm. Sign up using the link in the bio or send a direct message.

On Friday it was our Middle Eastern food evening where we had many students joining us for the first time. Lots of fun was had after eating Lamb and apricot tagine, shakshuka, Lebanese bread and rice.
.
If you would like to join in with any of our events, follow us on Instagram to stay informed or join our meetup group. Link in the bio.

If you have never walked along the Bridgewater Canal, we have a great event for you. We'll be taking relaxing walk, learning some of the canal history, taking some photos (if you want!) and making some new friends. This will be a great chance to see some of Manchester's historic features dating back over 250 years!
.
Meet at 2pm, Saturday 15th February outside of Central Library.
.
Check out the link in the bio for more information. Let us know if you are coming by:
⬇Commenting below
💬Sending a direct message
🖱Signing up using the link on our bio.

"I was taken by the view like we were in Paris"✨️🗼🇫🇷

Laura hat fünf Monate als #AuPair in einem Vorort von Paris gelebt und lernte in ihrer Gastfamilie die französische Kultur kennen: 

"Auf der Suche nach einer Möglichkeit, um mein Gap Year zu füllen bin ich auf active abroad gestoßen und daraufhin als Au Pair nach Frankreich gegangen. Ich kann euch nur sagen, es war so eine tolle Erfahrung!
Mit meinen Gasteltern habe ich mich super verstanden. Sie haben mich bei jeder Frage oder auch Problemen unterstützt. Ob gemeinsame Fernsehabende oder abends am Esstisch sitzen und gemeinsam traditionelle, französische Lieder hören...Meine Gastfamilie hatte drei Jungs, wobei ich hauptsächlich nur auf den jüngsten (10 Jahre) aufgepasst habe..."

➡️ Wie Lauras Freizeit als Au Pair in #Frankreich aussah, was ihr absolutes Highlight war und wieso sie jederzeit wieder Au Pair werden würde, liest du auf unserer Website! 🇫🇷👩‍👦

➡️ Du willst diesen Sommer auch noch als Au Pair ausreisen? In Frankreich gibt es noch einige liebe Gastfamilien, die Unterstützung ab sofort oder ab September suchen! 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Eine kurzfristige Bewerbung ist aktuell möglich! Alle Infos zum Programm findest du auf activeabroad.de 🧡

TRAVEL ON A BUDGET IN PERU 🇵🇪 
One of the best countries to travel if you are tight on pennies but still want to experience all the country has to offer! 

🏠 Accommodation: $15-$20/night. As a couple we stayed in hostels or homestays in private rooms as they were often cheaper than 2 dorm beds. These accomodations are usually ran by locals and are honestly amazing. We booked through booking.com and made sure they had good reviews. 

🏔️Activities: $20-$30/activity. The most popular thing to do in Peru is hike, which you can do for free. However sometimes it’s easiest and cheapest to book a tour for the transport (they still let you hike alone). We booked many tours through GetYourGuide for very affordable prices. There are so many companies so you don’t need to book in advance. 

🍣Food: $10-15/day. Eat locally and from street vendors!!! The food in Peru is amazing. We ate from the markets/street every day and had no issues with food poisoning. The ceviche is to die for. 

🚍Internal Travel: $10-$30/journey. The price depends on how long the journey is. You can book all your buses through redBus Peru online. It is simple and easy. The buses are comfortable and generally on time. No need to book far in advance, 1-4days is fine.

This year marks my 10 years ‘Vanniversary’, ya all! 🇨🇦 Ten years ago when the radio was loud of ‘I can’t feel my face’, ‘Hotline bling’ and ‘Blank Space’ I was making ice cream cakes, serving Blizzards or pasta at an Italian place — both which happened to be my main source of daily bread, still I somehow managed to be the fittest I’ve ever been. Within a year I moved three times, had my heart broken twice and learned some hard truths about friendships and other stuff as well. I found home away from home.
I miss the never-endig drizzles that turn everything green and those vanilla skies. Downtown smelled like Asian takeout mixed with salty ocean breeze. The city made me appreciate jazz and sushi, discover ukulele, made me burn sage and palo santo all before the craze, made me put nutritional yeast on top of every other meal, while drinking those awful long black coffees.
This is the place where I grew up, not in age but in spirit. That year cracked me open, reshaped my values, and changed the way I see everything.
My dear Vancouver, we shall meet again in this life! 💌. #vancouver #vancity #canada #transformation #spiritualgrowth #stanleypark #waterfront #lionsgate #yearabroad #timeofmylife #nostalgy #racoons #homeawayfromhome #gratitude #visualdiary

Laizität in Frankreich – Was bedeutet das für deinen Alltag als Sprach- und Kulturvermittler*in?

In Frankreich ist Religion Privatsache – besonders in der Schule.
Für euch kann das anfangs ungewohnt sein: kein Religionsunterricht, keine Weihnachtslieder im Klassenzimmer, keine religiösen Symbole.

Aber warum ist das so?
👉 Frankreich ist ein laizistischer Staat. Das bedeutet: Der Staat ist neutral gegenüber Religion – besonders in öffentlichen Einrichtungen wie Schulen.

🎒 Du betreust Kinder in Paris? Dann solltest du wissen, wie du mit religiösen Themen sensibel umgehst – und was du besser vermeidest. Dieser Post gibt dir einen schnellen Überblick!

💬 Was sind deine Erfahrungen mit dem Thema?
Erzähl es uns in den Kommentaren oder schreib uns eine DM.

📌 Post speichern, falls du nochmal nachlesen willst!

3 years and countless lessons later.

packing up a life you’ve always known and starting over in a completely new place where no one knows your name is a feeling that’s difficult to put into words.

I spent quite a bit of my first year abroad wondering if I was doing it right.

should I prioritise finding a job? making friends? finding a routine? finding a comfortable home?

I had (many) moments in the beginning where I felt completely overwhelmed and lost. I felt so much pressure to enjoy where I was - even if I wasn’t enjoying it all.

It’s crazy to me that it’s been three years and two countries later, and I don’t really worry about too much anymore.

Not because I have it all figured out, but because I’ve learnt to trust myself completely.

through experience, I’ve learnt to trust that everything will always come together exactly as it’s meant to.

But only if I continue to listen to myself carefully, and act accordingly. 

.
.
.
.
#moveabroad #liveabroad #traveller #aussieabroad #yearabroad

What my exchange year has taught me: 

•	How to say yes, even when I was scared.
•	That the world is so much bigger than my hometown.
•	That different doesn’t mean wrong — just different.
•	That comfort zones are meant to be broken.
•	That culture shock is real, but so is cultural love.
•	That homesickness means you have something worth missing.
•	How to let people in, even when you know you’ll have to say goodbye.
•	That the people you meet can change your life in just months.

👶🇫🇷 Wie sagen französische Kinder zu Oma und Opa? Und was ist ein "doudou"?
In Frankreich benutzt man im Kontext mit Kindern eine Vielzahl an Wörtern. Vielleicht sind einige davon ja nützlich für Euch bei der Kinderbetreuung! 

Wortschatz für den Alltag mit Kindern:
• 🏫 L‘école maternelle – der Kindergarten
• 🍼 la sucette – der Schnuller
• 🧸 le doudou – das Kuscheltier
• 🎨 le dessin – das (gemalte) Bild
• 😴 la sieste – der Mittagsschlaf
• 🎒 le cartable – der Schulranzen
• 👵👴mamie et papi – Oma & Opa
• 🐶 le toutou – der Hund (Wauwau)
• 🤕 avoir bobo – Aua haben / sich weh tun
• 🍫 le goûter – Kaffee-/Teezeit (süßer Nachmittagssnack für Kinder)
• 🌙 faire dodo – schlafen / Heia machen

Kosenamen, die Eltern in Frankreich oft verwenden:
• 🐞 Ma puce – mein Floh
• 💎 Mon trésor – mein Schatz
• 🐥 Mon poussin – mein Küken

After graduating, I moved to Perpignan with the Teaching Assistant Program in France. This bustling village provided a respite from a lifetime of hustle. It sloweeed things down and allowed me to recenter and reconnect.

The experience was lovely and often lonely. A couple weeks after I arrived, the g*n*c*de began, and I spent much of my time online, desperate to connect with people who were as enraged and heartbroken as I.

Although locals were intrigued by me, there was little effort to integrate me into their established social circles. Without a car I was relatively stuck, and it took about 8 months to stop feeling like every interaction is French wasn’t a mental task.

Despite the loneliness, I felt years of built up anxiety and the alarm of an internal clock dissipate. My position in the world became more clear and grounded. My love for myself and others grew more flexible and sound. I was living in a beautiful part of the world, and I relearned that there is magic everywhere when you know how to see it. 

I, an immigrant by choice and with citizenship, could not compare my struggles to many of the immigrants I befriended. I am humbled by their experiences, and grateful for their generosity with me.
They were a majority of my most meaningful connections. Moroccans, Spaniards, Algerians, and Senegalese embraced me, and together we explored the region and took on French bureaucracy and arrogance.

I want to thank the people who eased this transition for me. The ones who made linguistic barriers disappear, made me feel like my accent was colorful and endearing, and that I was always understood.

Who oriented their schedules to ensure I always had a ride when needed, and delivered dinners and toilet paper to my doorstep on Sundays when I forgot stores were closed.

Who drove me to the mountains and beach concaves when I craved the touch of nature. Who found joy in times shared together.

J’espère que instagram traduira ce message pour vous. Vous me manquez trop. Merci de m’avoir donné tant d’attention et de intérêt. Vous gardez un morceau de mon cœur pour toujours. Merci/Gracias/Shukran🫶

Study Abroad Weekend with Us- Part 2

Frolic in the French Riviera! 🇫🇷 

Here’s a few can’t miss activities for your next weekend adventure to Nice:

🥟Savor the Best Crepes in Town: Kickstart your adventure with a visit to Popothym
Creperie Saladerie, renowned for its mouthwatering, freshly-made crepes that perfectly capture the essence of authentic French cuisine.

🚶‍♀️Stroll the Iconic Promenade des Anglais: Enjoy the breathtaking views along the 7 km
world-famous seafront walkway. Perfect for a leisurely stroll, bike ride, or simply people-
watching, this promenade offers a quintessential Riviera experience. Don’t miss the panoramic vistas from Castle Hill, where you can see the entire Promenade des Anglais, the Baie des Anges, and the rooftops of the old town.

🛍️Explore the Vibrant Cours Saleya Market: Browse fresh flowers, local produce, and
unique souvenirs. This bustling market is a sensory delight, showcasing the vibrant colors and scents of Nice.

🦀Dine with a View at Le Plongeoir: This unique restaurant, perched on a rock above the Mediterranean Sea, offers exquisite seafood dishes and panoramic views that will have you writing home to mom about.

🏰Wander Through Historic Streets of Old Town Nice: Known for their vibrant colors,
stunning architecture, and rich history, Nice streets promise a photo opportunity on every corner. The Old Town (Vieux Nice) is especially famous for its narrow lanes and bustling squares.

🐸Taste the Adventure at Le Frog: Dare to try frog legs. This spot’s lively atmosphere and creative menu make this a must-visit spot for food enthusiasts.

🕺Experience Nightlife at Waka Bar: As the sun sets, the energy of Nice’s nightlife comes alive. Waka Bar, located right on the beach, is the perfect place to dance the night away. Enjoy refreshing cocktails, vibrant music, and the unforgettable ambiance of the French Riviera.

Be sure to share with your study abroad or travel buddies and save for reference!

✅ The project "Merry Erasmus+ Meet Up PBA" was a new opportunity for the various ngo's to get to know each other closely and lay the foundations for collaborations on new Erasmus Plus projects to be presented for the year 2024.

✅ A week, from 11 December to 16 December, during which youth workers from Romania, Bulgaria, Italy, Portugal, Poland, Turkey, Moldova, Greece, Ukraine, Spain and Croatia worked side by side.

✅ Ngo's with common goals have drafted projects in the fields that compete most with them, ngo's with different goals found a way to dialogue on unfamiliar topics with the aim of making the most of their potential.

✅ We have also discussed those problems that unfortunately occur in the implementation and management of Erasmus projects and, on a daily basis, in youth communities. Alcoholism, mental health, community integration. All topics to which we sought common and effective solutions.

✅ A stay that provided us with much food for thought and paved the way for a year full of activities and, we hope, much satisfaction!

✨The week of the "Merry Erasmus+ Meet Up PBA" event has come to an end!✨

🫂 A lot of young people from all over Europe got to know each other, developed new collaborations and pulled new ideas for future projects. 

🫀 Lively, constructive and edifying discussions, lots of workshops  and much more. 

🖋️ Above is a roundup of the presentation posters of each association. Each association was invited to tell its story and present its goals in an original, creative and inspiring way.

✨Thanks to this experience, we are full of inspiration and filled with great desire to do better!✨

The big Erasmus+ meet-up was a resounding success! For over two hours, our dedicated volunteers who visited Erasmus+ short-term projects in Italy🇮🇹, Portugal🇵🇹, and Czech Republic🇨🇿 were sharing their enriching experiences. 
They delved into the details of four transformative projects they participated in:

1. GREENER YOUTH - a sustainability project for youth workers in Italy.
2. OUT WITH THE NEW, IN WITH THE OLD - a sustainable fashion youth exchange in Portugal.
3. SAFE SPACES - youth workers mobility tackling gender issues in Italy.
4. ART Included - a youth exchange promoting inclusivity through improvisation theatre and other artistic forms in the Czech Republic 

Thank you for your enthusiasm and insights! We can’t wait to see what’s next at our upcoming meet-ups. 
P.S. Thank you @prostor39 for providing the space 
The Erasmus+ meetup is funded by the Erasmus+ program. 🇪🇺

📍 San Martino Valle Caudina, Ιταλία 🇮🇹
📅 APV: 1 – 4 Σεπτεμβρίου 2025 (μόνο για group leader)
📅 Youth Exchange: 17 – 29 Σεπτεμβρίου 2025

🌿 Θες να ζήσεις για 11 μέρες σε ένα μοναστήρι μέσα στη φύση; Να δοκιμάσεις vegan διατροφή ως πράξη προστασίας του περιβάλλοντος και των ζώων; Να συμμετέχεις σε δημιουργικά workshops, μαγειρικές, τέχνες, μουσική, φωτογραφία, χορό ή juggling, ενώ ζεις με νέους από όλη την Ευρώπη;

Στο Green Roots θα:
🟢 Συμμετέχεις σε βιωματικές δραστηριότητες και εργαστήρια πάνω σε οικολογία, ευεξία και δημιουργία
🟢 Μαγειρεύεις και μοιράζεσαι γεύματα βασισμένα σε τοπικά φυτικά υλικά
🟢 Ζήσεις σε κοινότητα με ίσες ευκαιρίες συμμετοχής και οριζόντια λήψη αποφάσεων

ℹ️ Περισσότερες πληροφορίες: https://tinyurl.com/grsoc-infopack
▶ Δήλωσε συμμετοχή: https://tinyurl.com/grsoc-apply

💸 Το πρόγραμμα συγχρηματοδοτείται από το Erasmus+ και καλύπτει πλήρως διαμονή, διατροφή και μετακινήσεις έως 309€

Budapest Nights Are Calling 🌙✨
From legendary spa parties in the Széchenyi Baths to floating clubs on the Danube, rooftop bars with epic views, and wild ruin bars in District VII. Budapest’s nightlife is like nowhere else. 🧖‍♀️🍸🚢

Dance under the stars at Pontoon, rave in the hull of a ship at A38, chill with skyline views at 360 Bar, or soak up the artsy vibes at Szimpla, the city delivers unforgettable nights on repeat.

📍 Hotspots: Akvárium Klub · Doboz · Toldi · Ötkert · Morri2 · Heaven … and more!

With thousands of new international students hitting the city, the energy is unreal and ELB’s event calendar is stacked to kick off the semester in style.

🤷‍♀️ “Emin değilim” demek istiyorsan, bu post tam sana göre!
🇩🇰 Danimarkalılar ne evet ne hayır derken hangi kalıpları kullanıyor biliyor musun?

💬 Måske…
💬 Det ved jeg ikke…
💬 Vi må se…
💬 Det kommer an på…
💬 Tjo, måske…

Hepsi aynı gibi mi geldi? Aslında hepsinin tonu farklı!
Birini kibarca oyalarken, diğerini gerçekten kararsızken kullanıyorlar.

📌 Bu kalıplar sayesinde artık “belirsizliği bile Danca konuşabileceksin!”
Kaydet, not al, pratikte kullan. Çünkü kararsızlık da bir iletişim becerisi!

👇 Yorumlara yaz:
Sen hangisini daha çok kullanıyorsun?
Måske – Vi må se – Tjo – Det ved jeg ikke – Det kommer an på?

Derneğimizin kurucu üyelerinden Serpil Karakiraz, Avrupa Birliği’nin prestijli araştırma programlarından Marie Skłodowska-Curie Actions (MSCA) kapsamında, Letonya Üniversitesi’nde düzenlenen Proje Yazma Kampına katılım sağlamıştır.

Bu kapsamlı programda; araştırma projelerinin yazım teknikleri, başvuru stratejileri, etik ilkeler ve bilimsel etki alanlarının geliştirilmesi gibi konularda derinlemesine bilgi ve deneyim edinilmiştir. Ayrıca, farklı ülkelerden akademisyenler ve araştırmacılar ile uluslararası iş birliği ağları kurma imkânı elde edilmiştir.

Derneğimiz, bu tür uluslararası kapasite geliştirme faaliyetleriyle bilimsel bilgi üretimini desteklemeye, araştırmacıların Avrupa düzeyindeki fırsatlara erişimini artırmaya ve güçlü ortaklıklar geliştirmeye devam etmektedir.

Hedefimiz, yerel ve uluslararası düzeyde yenilikçi projelerle sürdürülebilir ve kalıcı etki yaratmaktır.

📌 IKKE mi, VEL mi? – Danca’da kibar olumsuzluğun sırrı 💬

Danca’da ikke = net olumsuzluk ✅
Danca’da vel = kibarca onay ya da emin olma ❓

💡 “Jeg har ikke tid” → Vaktim yok. (düz ifade)
💡 “Du kommer vel i morgen?” → Yarın gelirsin, değil mi? (kibar beklenti)

Danca konuşanlar doğrudan söylemek yerine yumuşak, dolaylı ifadeleri tercih eder.
Bu yüzden vel, sadece dil bilgisi değil, Danca’nın kültürel nezaket kodlarını anlamanın da anahtarıdır.

✨ Örnekleri kaydet, farkı hisset, konuşmana hemen ekle!

Derneğimizin kurucu üyelerinden Serpil Karakiraz, Avrupa Birliği’nin prestijli araştırma programlarından Marie Skłodowska-Curie Actions (MSCA) kapsamında, Letonya Üniversitesi’nde düzenlenen Proje Yazma Kampına katılım sağlamıştır.

Bu kapsamlı programda; araştırma projelerinin yazım teknikleri, başvuru stratejileri, etik ilkeler ve bilimsel etki alanlarının geliştirilmesi gibi konularda derinlemesine bilgi ve deneyim edinilmiştir. Ayrıca, farklı ülkelerden akademisyenler ve araştırmacılar ile uluslararası iş birliği ağları kurma imkânı elde edilmiştir.

Derneğimiz, bu tür uluslararası kapasite geliştirme faaliyetleriyle bilimsel bilgi üretimini desteklemeye, araştırmacıların Avrupa düzeyindeki fırsatlara erişimini artırmaya ve güçlü ortaklıklar geliştirmeye devam etmektedir.

Hedefimiz, yerel ve uluslararası düzeyde yenilikçi projelerle sürdürülebilir ve kalıcı etki yaratmaktır.

Eduard Gabriel Podosu, Ştefan – Răzvan Tabacaru şi Cosmin-Constantin Ţurcă, studenţi în cadrul Facultăţii de Economie şi Administrarea Afacerilor, au participat la programul intensiv mixt „Digital Transformation of Agro-Companies” (mobilitate de studiu Erasmus+ de scurtă durată), desfăşurat în perioada 30 iunie – 04 iulie 2025, în Almeria, Spania.

Testimonialele primite consolidează ideea că şi mobilităţile ERASMUS+ de scurtă durată contribuie la dezvoltarea academică şi personală a studenţilor. 

Dacă nu te simţi pregătit să aplici pentru o mobilitate de lungă durată, începe cu un stagiu de scurtă durată (între 5 şi 30 de zile)! Garantăm că ERASMUS+ dă dependenţă!

„Erasmusul în Almería a fost, fără îndoială, una dintre cele mai frumoase experiențe, de la cursuri practice până la plimbări memorabile prin orașul încărcat de istorie. Am descoperit o Spanie autentică, am întâlnit oameni minunați cu care încă țin legătura, am învățat să mă descurc în spaniolă și am trăit pe pielea mea ritmul relaxat al celor din Andaluzia, toate acestea făcând din acest Erasmus o experiență completă, plină de învățături, prietenii și amintiri de neuitat.” - Eduard Gabriel Podosu

„O experiență de neuitat. Această mobilitate de scurtă durată Erasmus+ mi-a oferit în primul rând oportunitatea de a lega prietenii. Mi-a schimbat complet modul în care privesc schimbul de experiență cu studenți din alte țări. Am avut ocazia să vizitez diferite companii specializate în agronomie, unde ni s-au prezentat tehnologiile pe care acestea le aplică. Per total, a fost o experiență memorabilă. Recomand cu căldură tuturor această oportunitate!” – Cosmin Constantin Ţurcă.

🎉✨ 3 DAYS. 1 EPIC ADVENTURE! ✨
Join us for an unforgettable PRAGUE TRIP packed with culture, parties, and international memories 💃🍻

🗓️ 10–12 October
3 full days of good vibes in Prague, plus bonus stops in Brno and Bratislava!
Pre-registration is now OPEN!

📍 What’s on the plan?

🥇 DAY 1
🚌 Departure around 00:30 (Friday night) from Nyugati bus parking
🏰 First sights of Prague, hostel check-in, free time
🍻 Optional group dinner & party

🥈 DAY 2
☕ Breakfast + second round of sightseeing
🎉 Optional bar crawl & wild party night

🥉 DAY 3
🚍 Check-out & departure
🏙️ Sightseeing in Brno + Bratislava
🏁 Back to Budapest in the evening

🗺️ Top sights in Prague:
✔️ Charles Bridge, Prague Castle, Old Town Square, Lennon Wall
✔️ Jewish Ghetto, St. Vitus Cathedral, Sigmund Freud statue & more!

🎟️ Tickets coming soon!
💸 Provisional price: ~145€

Yay! I’m so happy to be accepted! It was my first and only choice from the beggining🥳🥰I got accepted into the ABSN program after finishing my 1 year of prerequisites. I’m very grateful to be where I am right now and excited for the journey ahead of me. This year of prerequisites, I was very busy, but with the right time management, I was able to party, host parties, travel, do vlogs, and a lot more. Now I want to say that because the nursing program is very rigorous—especially the accelerated one, which is double the hustle and double the stress—I won’t be able to maintain my previous social life. But this kind of stress I love. I thrive under pressure and competition 🌟
And just to clarify—I don’t study 24/7 as some of my friends think 😅 I’m just an introvert by nature, so during my rest time, I like to be alone and not socialize much. It doesn’t mean I don’t care! Of course, I’ll try not to miss important events in my friends’ lives ❤️ 
#ZhannurRN

Did you say “Italian style vibes”? 🇮🇹 
There is an all-Italian energy that ignites with the sea in front of you, surrounded by the scent of lemons, a Spritz in your hand and music that makes you want to dance, laugh, and live. 

We are in the beautiful Sorrento Peninsula, where every wedding weekend becomes a true celebration for the senses: dream locations, authentic flavors, hugs, and that warm, welcoming atmosphere that only the Italian lifestyle can offer.

Here, we toast to life, celebrate love in style and dance late into the night with the sea as a backdrop. Pure magic!✨
--
Hai detto "italian style vibes"? 🇮🇹

C’è un’energia tutta italiana che si accende quando il mare è lì, circondato dal profumo degli agrumi, uno Spritz in mano e quella musica che fa venir voglia di ballare, ridere, vivere.

Siamo nella splendida Penisola Sorrentina, dove ogni wedding weekend diventa una vera festa per i sensi: tra location da sogno, gusti autentici, abbracci sinceri e quell’atmosfera calda, accogliente, che solo l’Italian lifestyle sa creare.

Qui si brinda alla vita, si celebra l’amore con stile, si danza fino a tardi con il mare come sottofondo. Pura magia!✨

THE GOLDEN CITY HOTEL - BALLARAT,VICTORIA.

Established in 1856 as the Adelphi Hotel and occupying a prominent corner position opposite St Patrick’s Cathedral is the Golden City Hotel.A 1900 alteration saw the addition of a verandah and the adoption of its current name to what we see today.
This is a pub that opens early for breakfast.And as it was a little early to enjoy a beer,I decided to enjoy a mug of mocha.The breakfast menu is large and includes my favourite option of Eggs Benedict.Both the lunch and dinner menus are huge with many pub classics,pasta,steaks,and Asian dishes with vegan options available,all of which can be enjoyed in the main dining area on the ground floor.And for large functions there’s the airy Atrium Room and upstairs you have the Balcony Room.
Adjacent to the café side of the pub are the four taps of mainstream beers plus a ginger beer and lemon squash.
Finally,thank you to Dee and Lecey for the great service.

Enjoy.Cheers🍺.

Day 3 Croatie 🇭🇷 : Today, I had the unforgettable experience of dining in the sky above Dubrovnik @dinnerintheskydubrovnik . Suspended high above the ground, I enjoyed a delicious meal while admiring a breathtaking panoramic view of the city’s ancient walls, red rooftops, and the sparkling Adriatic Sea. The golden sunset bathed the historic streets below, creating a magical, once-in-a-lifetime moment. 🌅✨

Tomorrow’s adventure: an exciting quad safari at Kojan Koral during the day, followed by a lively Columbo Pub Crawl in Dubrovnik at night. 🏍

Come on in to Monroe's Tavern on the 29th of August to catch Federica & Lorcan performing on our stage from 7:30-9:30 p.m. on Friday night 🧡 

Federica Fruscella is an Italian born independent artist, singer and composer based in Dublin. Her creative world revolves around music, theatre, translation and a deep interest in psyche and folktales, finding its roots in a family tradition of storytelling. Through the years, she has focused her musical research on unreleased melodies both from the Celtic world and the Mediterranean area. She recently released her first solo album inspired by Celtic folklore, and her beautifully expressive voice lends a warm Mediterranean flavor to the Celtic songs.

Lorcan has been performing live and recording for almost twenty years with various acts and in numerous styles, in places as diverse as New York, Australia, the UK, and continental Europe. After years of travel and self-discovery, Lorcan returned to Ireland in 2020 to pursue a career playing and teaching music. Lorcan holds a diploma in professional musicianship from BIMM Dublin, and is a versatile guitarist and a seasoned entertainer who enjoys performing in different styles.

We can't wait!

caption:
A pub crawl is not only about the beers but meeting the locals.

Peter at The Mauldons Brewery Tap took a shine to my @prancingponybrewery cap and tshirt. Got chatting about local beers, the Australian craft beer scene and even McLaren Vale wine region.

Then got back to drinking. 

The “Black Adder” Stout, at 5.3%, was a warm, smooth and flavoursome brew. A rich dark colour, this settles down with zero head and chocolatey aromatic notes. Good level of bitterness, blended with vibes of roasted nut, gives this a dry sensation. Fruity notes and splash of cocoa delivers a slightly smooth, chocolatey mouthfeel that lingers on the tongue throughout.

A huge dark roasty beer and a great local bloke!

Brewery: @mauldonsbrewery 
Style: Stout
ABV: 5.3%
Does what it says on the can: YES
Rate: Very Good
Verdict: Recommend

Vuoi partire con noi in Erasmus+? Ti spieghiamo come si fa ✨📩

Niente “mi mandate il link?”, niente “non ho capito dove devo cliccare” 😅
Tutte le nostre occasioni da urlo vengono pubblicate sui social ufficiali, e sotto ogni post c’è già tutto scritto. Basta solo leggere.
Sì, tutto-tutto. Non solo le prime due righe 👀

📌 Ogni post ti dice:

* DOVE e QUANDO si parte
* CHI stiamo cercando (magari sei proprio tu)
* COSA si fa (attività, temi, obiettivi e magie varie)
* A CHI scrivere per dubbi o domande

🚫 Non usiamo moduli Google, niente link da commentare o spam sotto i post.
Vuoi partecipare davvero? Allora preparati bene 💪

📝 Cosa serve per candidarsi:
1️⃣ Una lettera motivazionale — e no, ChatGPT qui non ti aiuta. Scrivila tu, con parole tue, a mano o al PC. L’onestà vince.
2️⃣ Il tuo CV — niente robe ultra formali, ci basta capire se hai le basi per questo tipo di esperienza.

📍 Siamo un’associazione toscana (sì, tra colline, ulivi e progetti europei 🌿), quindi diamo priorità a:

1. Chi è già membro della nostra crew
2. Giovani dalla Toscana
3. Chi vive in zone rurali o in situazioni un po’ complicate

🇮🇹 Ma chi può partecipare?
Tutte le persone italiane o residenti in Italia! Nessuna esclusione, solo tanta motivazione.

💬 Quindi, ricapitolando:
Leggi tutto, candidati bene, sii sincer\*, e parti con la voglia di imparare davvero 💡
L’Europa ti aspetta… e anche noi! 🌍

#erasmusvibes #erasmusplus #toscanapower #erasmuslife #nonformaleducation #viaggiareimparando #youthexchange #trainingcourse #europalmente #opportunitàchevalgono

Erasmus+ non è un villaggio turistico: è molto meglio!

Ok, mettiamola così: se stai pensando “che bello, una vacanzina pagata in Europa”, fermati un attimo. Respira.
🛑 Questo NON è quel tipo di esperienza.
Qui non si va al mare a sorseggiare mojito, ma a scambiare idee, culture e visioni con persone che arrivano da mezza Europa 🌍💬

👀 Cosa troverai in un progetto Erasmus+?
✨ Persone come te, curiose e sveglie
🧠 Workshop che fanno ragionare (e pure divertire)
💬 Discussioni che ti aprono la mente
🎭 Attività di gruppo, giochi, serate interculturali, mini missioni impossibili
🤝 Condivisione vera. Tipo, quella che non si fa su Instagram.

📌 Partecipare è obbligatorio (e no, non è una parolaccia).
Se sei del team “eh ma io dormo fino a mezzogiorno” o “non mi va di stare in gruppo”, forse questo non fa per te.
Meglio saperlo prima che trovarsi spaesato dopo.

🛏 Cosa NON troverai?
❌ Letti a baldacchino
❌ Colazione a buffet 4 stelle
❌ Shopping tour organizzati
❌ Tempo libero infinito
❌ Clima da resort

Troverai invece:
✅ Camerate o stanze semplici ma pulite
✅ Cibo locale (a volte ottimo, a volte… da raccontare)
✅ Ritmi intensi ma pieni di energia
✅ Bagni condivisi e tante risate
✅ Un’esperienza vera, fuori dalla comfort zone, dentro il mondo reale

🌍Apri la mente, non solo la valigia.
Ricorda che starai in un Paese che ha usi, abitudini e magari orari un po’ diversi dai tuoi. E no, non è strano: è il bello del viaggio!
🙃 Adattati, osserva, rispetta. Le lamentele da principino/a non servono a nessuno.

🎁🎉 In cambio avrai:
💡 Amicizie che durano più delle stories
🌈 Momenti unici (anche se stai mangiando zuppa alle 8:00 del mattino)
🛤 Ricordi che non stanno in valigia
💬 Una nuova versione di te

Pronti a fare sul serio con testa e cuore?
Se la risposta è “Sì, ci sto!”, allora vieni con noi 🌟
Se invece preferisci il relax in spiaggia… c’è sempre il resort 🏖️

#erasmusvibes #nonèunavacanza #menteaperta #esperienzevere #travelwithpurpose #europalife #travel #new #friends #education #experience

📵 Oggi niente stories.

Niente filtri, niente swipe up.

🏙️Solo tu e la città.

🏘️Perditi tra le strade, ascolta le voci, senti l’aria.

✨ Vivi davvero, condividi dopo.

#OfflineForADay #LiveTheMoment #ErasmusVibes #NoStoriesJustLife

🌎🏃 Barcelona | 12.2024 🇪🇸 

I come from Brittany, in France.

I was born and grew up there before moving to Nantes for my studies.

In 2003, I discovered Kraków as an Erasmus student.

Since then, I have been living and developing my companies in my beloved city. 

I come back to Brittany in general every 2 years for Christmas time. 

For a long time, I was used to flying from Krakow to Paris and then to go by train from Paris to my home town there. 

Nevertheless, over the past few years, we usually fly from Krakow to somewhere in Southern Europe (Italy, Portugal, or Spain for now) to spend a few days there and then fly on to Nantes.

Last time, we chose Barcelona and it was definitely a very good choice. 

The weather was amazing for winter time. 

It was not my 1st stay in the capital of Catalonia. Anyway, it is always a good idea to experience Barcelona at its best. There are so many beautiful places to visit and things to do there. 

@visitbarcelona ☀️

Tu veux progresser en anglais, mais t’enchaînes les applis sans oser parler ?
Tu connais déjà les bases, mais t’as l’impression de stagner ? 😩
Tu n’es pas seul. Et surtout : ce n’est pas une question de volonté.

👉 Le vrai problème, c’est que t’apprends une langue sans jamais la vivre.
📱 Regarder des vidéos ou faire des quiz, c’est bien.
Mais parler avec des vrais gens, dans un vrai contexte ?
C’est là que ça devient puissant !

En immersion, tu n’as pas le choix : tu dois comprendre, t’exprimer, improviser…
Et surtout : tu reprends confiance. Tu vois que tu peux y arriver.
Et ça, c’est LE boost de motivation.

Alors si tu veux :
✔️ Oser parler pour de vrai
✔️ Gagner en fluidité sans réfléchir à chaque mot
✔️ Avoir un déclic qui change tout

Pense immersion. Même courte. Même intense.

C’est plus efficace que 12 mois de théorie.
Et ça peut changer ton rapport aux langues 

#immersionlinguistique #anglaisetud #étudiantsmotivation #erasmusvibes #anglaisfacile #séjourlinguistique #apprendreuneautrelangue #objectiflangue #yourewelcome
ownerFullName: You're Welcome Séjours linguistiques en immersion

Germanistyka w Nysie - Twój paszport do przygody! 🌍✈️

Pani Jessica pakuje walizki - już wkrótce spędzi semestr w Kassel!🔥

Tak właśnie wygląda germanistyka w Nysie: uczysz się języka w praktyce, poznajesz ludzi z całej Europy i zdobywasz doświadczenie, które daje Ci realną przewagę – na studiach, w pracy i w życiu.

Nasza germanistyka to coś więcej niż zajęcia w sali. Dzięki współpracy z uczelniami w Niemczech i Austrii w ramach programu Erasmus+ możesz wyjechać na rok za granicę, brać udział w międzynarodowych projektach i rozwijać się tam, gdzie język niemiecki jest codziennością.

Chcesz studiować z pomysłem, pasją i planem na przyszłość? Wybierz germanistykę w Nysie - tu nadajesz kierunek swojej przyszłości! 🧭✨

#GermanistykaNysa #StudiujZPasją #ErasmusVibes #KierunekNiemcy #KierunekAustria #NysaNaStart

🌄 Granada, Spain 🇪🇸

Why go?
Breathtaking sunsets, tapas gratis and student life that never sleeps 🌅🍷📚

Best for:
Culture seekers, language learners, and anyone who loves living outdoors.

What to do:
🏰 Visit the Alhambra at golden hour
🥘 Enjoy free tapas with every drink (yes, really)
🕺 Join flamenco nights in the Albaicín
🎿 Weekend ski trips to Sierra Nevada? Yes, please.

💸 Tip: Tapas are better (and cheaper) away from Plaza Nueva.
✨ Pro tip: Live near Camino de Ronda or Realejo for the perfect Erasmus mix.

📌 Granada = sunshine, sangría & stories to tell ✨🇪🇸

#GranadaErasmus #SpainOnABudget #StudyInSpain #UniversitasMundi #TapasLife #ErasmusVibes

Cześć! ❤️
Jestem Kama i właśnie kończę pracę nad e-bookiem, który pomoże Ci ogarnąć wyjazd na studia zagraniczne w ramach wymiany akademickiej – krok po kroku.

📚 Czego możesz spodziewać się w środku?

📌 Lista wymaganych dokumentów i jak je ogarnąć. 

📌 Co trzeba zrobić, żeby dostać stypendium.

📌 Jak nie wpaść w pułapki przy szukaniu mieszkania.

📌 Jak przeżyć pierwszy tydzień w nowym kraju.

Moje doświadczenie? Na wymianie zagranicznej byłam cztery razy (!) i wiem dokładnie, jak wygląda cały ten proces - łącznie z paniką przy Learning Agreement i szukaniu kart SIM w obcym języku 😂

Na tym profilu będę wrzucać:
✅ konkretne wskazówki
✅ checklisty
✅ odpowiedzi na pytania

📩 Jeśli chcesz być jedną z pierwszych osób, które dostaną dostęp do e-booka, napisz do mnie albo zostaw komentarz!

#studiazagranica #mobilnoscstudencka #wymianaakademicka #życiestudenta #studenttips #erasmuslife #erasmustips #wakacje #studia #erasmusstudent #erasmusguide #erasmusvibes #erasmusczeka

🏝 Journée détente à la plage de l’Hermitage
Mode samedi activé 😎🌊

Sharks nearby? Yep, fun times 😅
Les plages peuvent être imprévisibles, et quand l’océan décide de faire son show, les grosses vagues débarquent, les drapeaux rouges se lèvent et… tu restes à sec.
Heureusement, la plage de l’Hermitage est un havre de paix – une barrière de corail fait office de garde du corps, donc tu peux flotter tranquille comme une étoile de mer heureuse.
Pas de drapeau rouge, pas de 🦈, pas de drama.

📍 Première étape de mon itinéraire de 10 jours sur l’île de La Réunion – l’endroit idéal pour commencer ton aventure.
#ReunionInANutshell revient bientôt avec d’autres pépites à découvrir !

📋 Омладинска размена "Intercultural Circus"
🌍 Где? Висбаден, Немачка 🇩🇪
📆 Када? 29.08.2025. - 06.09.2025.
👥 За кога? Млади (17-25 година)

‼️НАПОМЕНА: Учесници ће бити смештени у шаторима, у оквиру кампа. ⛺

📌 О пројекту:

Пројекат „Intercultural Circus“ окупља 60 младих из 8 европских земаља који ће кроз циркуске радионице истраживати како покрет, вештина и уметност могу повезати различите културе. Без обзира на претходно искуство, учесници ће имати прилику да уче, размењују знања и сарађују у подстицајном интеркултуралном окружењу. Пројекат се завршава заједничком представом која одражава креативност, јединство и заједнички дух.

🔍 Желиш да се пријавиш? Више информација и пријавни формулар можеш пронаћи у опису нашег профила! 🔗

⏳ Рок за пријаву: 09.08.2025 до 23:59 часова. 🚨

🍋 Lemon – Back to Nature | Youth Exchange στην Ιταλία!

Θες να ζήσεις μια εμπειρία κοντά στη φύση, να μάθεις για την παραδοσιακή καλλιέργεια λεμονιών και να ανακαλύψεις πώς η αγροτική ζωή μπορεί να σε εμπνεύσει για ένα πιο βιώσιμο και υγιεινό μέλλον; Το Lemon - Back to Nature είναι μια Erasmus+ ανταλλαγή νέων που θα πραγματοποιηθεί στην Ιταλία και θα σου προσφέρει πρακτική γνώση, σύνδεση με τον τόπο και την παράδοση, και δυνατές διεθνείς εμπειρίες!

📍 Τι θα ζήσεις;
 ✅ Πρακτική εμπειρία στην καλλιέργεια λεμονιών και βιώσιμες γεωργικές τεχνικές
 ✅ Επαφή με τοπικούς αγρότες & επαγγελματίες του αγροδιατροφικού τομέα
 ✅ Εργαστήρια επιχειρηματικότητας με έμπνευση από την τοπική κουλτούρα
 ✅ Συμμετοχή σε δραστηριότητες με άξονα τη φύση, την υγεία και την ένταξη
 ✅ Ανταλλαγή ιδεών και κουλτούρας με νέους από διάφορες χώρες της Ευρώπης

📅 Πότε: APV 23-25 Οκτωβρίου (2 μέλη, απαραίτητο να συμμετέχουν και στα 2 ταξίδια)
Youth exchange 23-30 Νοεμβρίου (1 team leader 18+ & 5 μέλη - 18-25 ετών) 
📌 Πού: Avola, Ιταλία

👉 Τίτλος: Peace within! Peace Beyond (Ανταλλαγή Νέων)

📍 Τοποθεσία: Μπακουριάνι, Γεωργία
📅 Ημερομηνίες: 15–23 Οκτωβρίου
👥 Συμμετέχοντες: 5 άτομα (18–30 ετών) και 1 ομαδάρχης χωρίς όριο ηλικίας
⏳ Προθεσμία αιτήσεων: 3 Αυγούστου

💡 Περιγραφή: Με το πρόγραμμα “Peace Within, Peace Beyond”, θέλουμε να απαντήσουμε σε μερικές από τις μεγαλύτερες προκλήσεις που αντιμετωπίζουν οι νέοι σήμερα – όπως ο λόγος μίσους, οι διακρίσεις, η ριζοσπαστικοποίηση και η τοξικότητα στο διαδίκτυο. Πιστεύουμε πως η ειρήνη δεν ξεκινά μόνο σε παγκόσμιο επίπεδο, αλλά από τον κάθε άνθρωπο ξεχωριστά.

Το πρόγραμμα εστιάζει τόσο στην εσωτερική ειρήνη (συναισθηματική ευημερία, ενσυνειδητότητα, έκφραση) όσο και στην εξωτερική (μέσα από διάλογο, ψηφιακή συνείδηση και ενεργή συμμετοχή στις κοινότητες). Νέοι από τη Γερμανία, τη Γεωργία, τη Λιθουανία, την Ελλάδα, την Ουκρανία και την Αρμενία θα συναντηθούν για να μάθουν ο ένας από τον άλλον και να ανακαλύψουν πώς μπορούν να συμβάλλουν θετικά στην κοινωνία – τόσο online όσο και offline.

🍽️ Διατροφή και διαμονή καλύπτονται πλήρως
✈️ Έξοδα ταξιδιού καλύπτονται έως 365€
👥 Η ετήσια συνδρομή μέλους του οργανισμού είναι 60€

🇪🇺 Erasmus+ Training Course in Croatia 🇭🇷 – "RAZOR"

📌 Veli Iž, Croatia 🇭🇷
📅 3–11 October 2025 (including travel days)

RAZOR is a training course designed to improve the quality of youth work through the promotion of critical thinking 🧠🔍.

Using non-formal education methodologies, participants will deepen their knowledge and skills in critical thinking and conspiracy theories, and learn how to use practical tools to foster it in youth work.

✅ We are selecting 3 participants from Spain.
Requirements:
✔️ Live in Spain
✔️ Be over 18 years old
✔️ Be actively involved in youth work (education, volunteering, etc.)

💶 Erasmus+ covers travel, accommodation, meals, and activities.
⏳ Application deadline: 8th August 2025

📢 URGENT CALL ΓΙΑ ΕΝΑΝ ΈΛΛΗΝΑ ΣΥΜΜΕΤΈΧΟΝΤΑ– Ανταλλαγή Νέων Erasmus+

👉 Τίτλος: Screen to Self: Επανέλαβε την Ευεξία σου στην Ψηφιακή Εποχή

📍 Τοποθεσία: Villa Andropoff, Πέρνου, Εσθονία

📅 Ημερομηνίες: 11–18 Αυγούστου 2025 (συμπεριλαμβανομένων των ημερών ταξιδιού)

💡 Περιγραφή:
Έχεις κουραστεί από το ατελείωτο σκρολάρισμα; Θέλεις να επαναπροσδιορίσεις τη σχέση σου με τα social media; Πάρε μέρος στην ανταλλαγή νέων «Screen to Self», ένα πρόγραμμα Erasmus+ που εξερευνά τον αντίκτυπο των ψηφιακών συνηθειών στην ψυχική υγεία!

Μέσα από βιωματικά εργαστήρια, 24ωρη αποτοξίνωση από τα social media, υπαίθριες δραστηριότητες και διαπολιτισμική ανταλλαγή, θα έχεις την ευκαιρία να:

🌿 Ανακαλύψεις στρατηγικές για ψηφιακή ισορροπία
🤝 Συνδεθείς με τη φύση και με συνομήλικους από όλη την Ευρώπη
📢 Συν-δημιουργήσεις εκστρατείες ενημέρωσης για να τις μοιραστείς στην κοινότητά σου

😋 Διαμονή και διατροφή καλύπτονται πλήρως

Orientation for Batch 2025-2027, Day 1
--
The Orientation Program for the newly admitted MBA students Batch 2025-2027 was a vibrant and inspiring start to their management journey 🎓✨. The session was graced by the Managing Trustee, Shri Pragnesh K. Shastri, Director Dr. Neha Patel, and Additional Director Dr. Supriya Bhutiani 🙏, who warmly welcomed 🤝 the first-year students and shared valuable insights into the institute’s vision, values, and expectations 💡📚. They emphasized the importance of integrity, innovation, and industry readiness 🚀, encouraging students to make the most of the academic and co-curricular opportunities ahead. At SLIMS, we firmly believe that an orientation program plays a vital role in facilitating a smooth transition into a new academic environment 🏫🌟. They help students understand the curriculum, campus culture, and support systems 📖, while also building a sense of community with peers and faculty 👥💬. It sets the tone for a positive, purposeful, and productive learning experience over the next two years 📆💪.
--
The Orientation Program will span across five engaging days 📅🎯, each thoughtfully curated to offer a unique and enriching experience 🌈 for the newly admitted MBA students. From insightful sessions by industry experts 🗣️💼 and interactive faculty introductions 👩‍🏫👨‍🏫 to ice-breaking activities 🎲, campus tours 🚶‍♂️🏛️, and career readiness workshops 🛠️, each day will bring something new and exciting 🎉. This multi-day format will ensure a gradual and meaningful immersion into the academic culture 📚, preparing students not just for the classroom 🏫 but also for leadership, collaboration, and lifelong learning 🌟🤝.
--

Our English Immersion Programme students went on a leisurely walk through MUWCI’s beautiful biodiversity park 🌿. 

Surrounded by native plants and birdsong, they explored the rich heritage of our hill. A perfect start to their journey of learning and living at MUWCI! 

FUN FACT: The biodiversity park at MUWCI is not a natural one. Every tree was planted by faculty, staff, and students from the time the college was founded. This was once a barren land that has now become a forest.

Tinggal sedikit lagi program kerja BEM FH Unimma akan selesai, besar harapan dari BEM FH yg akan datang semoga dapat lebih profesional dan unggul lagi kedepannya sesuai dengan tema mubes kali ini. Terimakasih kami ucapkan.

Sobat mau kuliah di luar kota? Kopernya udah siap? Baju udah dilipet rapi? Tiket juga udah di tangan kan Sob? Tapi, gimana nih dengan mental Sobat? Udah siapin mental anti homesick belum? Hihihi 😆

Tinggal jauh dari rumah bukan cuma soal pindah tempat Sob, tapi juga soal siap nggaknya Sobat menghadapi perubahan mulai dari adaptasi lingkungan, manajemen diri, sampai rasa kangen rumah yang kadang suka datang tiba-tiba. 

Nah, biar Sobat nggak cuma siap secara fisik, yuk cek 4 mental yang wajib Sobat bawa sebelum mulai hidup sebagai anak rantau.

Yuk siapin diri Sobat dari sekarang yaa! 🤗
